atk-s0301a:14: Buddhopi buddhabhāvaṃ, bhāvetvā ceva sacchikatvā ca;
atk-s0301a:15: Yaṃ upagato gatamalaṃ, vande tamanuttaraṃ dhammaṃ.
atk-s0301a:23: Pañcahi yā saṅgītā, anusaṅgītā ca pacchāpi.
atk-s0301a:33: Saṅgītīnaṃ dvinnaṃ, yā me atthaṃ vadantena.
atk-s0301a:34: Vitthāravasena sudaṃ, vatthūni ca yāni tattha vuttāni;
atk-s0301a:35: Tesampi na idha bhiyyo, vitthārakathaṃ karissāmi.
atk-s0301a:36: Suttānaṃ pana atthā, na vinā vatthūhi ye pakāsanti;
atk-s0301a:44: Iti pana sabbaṃ yasmā, visuddhimagge mayā suparisuddhaṃ;
atk-s0301a:45: Vuttaṃ tasmā bhiyyo, na taṃ idha vicārayissāmi.
atk-s0301a:48: Icceva kato tasmā, tampi gahetvāna saddhimetāya;
atk-s0301a:55: Tattha saṃyuttāgamo nāma sagāthāvaggo, nidānavaggo, khandhakavaggo, saḷāyatanavaggo, mahāvaggoti pañcavaggo hoti. Suttato –
atk-s0301a:58_0: Bhāṇavārato bhāṇavārasataṃ hoti. Tassa vaggesu sagāthāvaggo ādi, suttesu oghataraṇasuttaṃ.
atk-s0301a:58_1: Tassāpi “evaṃ me suta”ntiādikaṃ āyasmatā ānandena paṭhamamahāsaṅgītikāle vuttaṃ nidānamādi.
atk-s0301a:58_2: Sā panesā paṭhamamahāsaṅgīti sumaṅgalavilāsiniyā dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathāya ādimhi vitthāritā,
atk-s0301a:59_0: 1. Yaṃ panetaṃ “evaṃ me suta”ntiādikaṃ nidānaṃ, tattha evanti nipātapadaṃ. Metiādīni
atk-s0301a:59_1: nāmapadāni. Sāvatthiyaṃ viharatīti ettha vīti upasaggapadaṃ, haratīti ākhyātapadanti
atk-s0301a:60_1: Tathā hesa – “evaṃ jātena maccena, kattabbaṃ kusalaṃ bahu”nti evamādīsu upamāyaṃ
atk-s0301a:60_2: āgato. “Evaṃ te abhikkamitabbaṃ, evaṃ te paṭikkamitabba”ntiādīsu upadese. “Evametaṃ
atk-s0301a:60_3: bhagavā, evametaṃ sugatā”tiādīsu sampahaṃsane. “Evamevaṃ panāyaṃ vasalī yasmiṃ vā
atk-s0301a:60_4: tasmiṃ vā tassa muṇḍakassa samaṇakassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsatī”tiādīsu garahaṇe. “Evaṃ, bhanteti
atk-s0301a:60_5: kho te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosu”ntiādīsu vacanasampaṭiggahe. “Evaṃ byā kho ahaṃ,
atk-s0301a:60_6: bhante, bhagavatā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāmī”tiādīsu ākāre. “Ehi tvaṃ māṇavaka, yena
atk-s0301a:60_7: samaṇo ānando tenupasaṅkama; upasaṅkamitvā mama vacanena samaṇaṃ ānandaṃ appābādhaṃ
atk-s0301a:60_8: appātaṅkaṃ lahuṭṭhānaṃ balaṃ phāsuvihāraṃ puccha – ‘subho māṇavo todeyyaputto bhavantaṃ
atk-s0301a:60_9: ānandaṃ appābādhaṃ appātaṅkaṃ lahuṭṭhānaṃ balaṃ phāsuvihāraṃ pucchatī’ti. Evañca
atk-s0301a:60_10: vadehi – ‘sādhu kira bhavaṃ ānando yena subhassa māṇavassa todeyyaputtassa nivesanaṃ,
atk-s0301a:60_11: tenupasaṅkamatu anukampaṃ upādāyā’ti”ādīsu nidassane. “Taṃ kiṃ maññatha kālāmā, ime
atk-s0301a:60_12: dhammā kusalā vā akusalā vāti? Akusalā, bhante. Sāvajjā vā anavajjā vāti? Sāvajjā,
atk-s0301a:60_13: bhante. Viññugarahitā vā viññuppasatthā vāti? Viññugarahitā, bhante. Samattā samādinnā
atk-s0301a:60_14: ahitāya dukkhāya saṃvattanti vā no vā, kathaṃ vo ettha hotīti? Samattā, bhante, samādinnā
atk-s0301a:60_15: ahitāya dukkhāya saṃvattanti, evaṃ no ettha hotī”tiādīsu avadhāraṇe. Svāyamidha ākāranidassanāvadhāraṇesu daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0301a:61_0: Tattha ākāratthena evaṃsaddena etamatthaṃ dīpeti – nānānayanipuṇaṃ anekajjhāsayasamuṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0301a:61_2: sakasakabhāsānurūpato sotapathamāgacchantaṃ tassa bhagavato vacanaṃ sabbappakārena
atk-s0301a:61_3: ko samattho viññātuṃ? Sabbathāmena pana sotukāmataṃ janetvāpi evaṃ me sutaṃ, mayāpi
atk-s0301a:62: Nidassanatthena – “nāhaṃ sayambhū, na mayā idaṃ sacchikata”nti attānaṃ parimocento – “evaṃ me sutaṃ, mayāpi evaṃ suta”nti idāni vattabbaṃ sakalasuttaṃ nidasseti.
atk-s0301a:63_0: Avadhāraṇatthena – “etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ bahussutānaṃ
atk-s0301a:63_1: yadidaṃ ānando, gatimantānaṃ, satimantānaṃ, dhitimantānaṃ, upaṭṭhākānaṃ yadidaṃ ānando”ti
atk-s0301a:63_2: evaṃ bhagavatā – “āyasmā ānando atthakusalo dhammakusalo byañjanakusalo niruttikusalo
atk-s0301a:63_3: pubbāparakusalo”ti evaṃ dhammasenāpatinā ca pasatthabhāvānurūpaṃ attano dhāraṇabalaṃ
atk-s0301a:63_4: dassento sattānaṃ sotukāmataṃ janeti – “evaṃ me sutaṃ, tañca kho atthato vā byañjanato
atk-s0301a:63_5: vā anūnamanadhikaṃ, evameva na aññathā daṭṭhabba”nti.
atk-s0301a:64_0: Mesaddo tīsu atthesu dissati. Tathā hissa – “gāthābhigītaṃ me abhojaneyya”ntiādīsu
atk-s0301a:64_1: mayāti attho. “Sādhu me, bhante, bhagavā saṃkhittena dhammaṃ desetū ” tiādīsu mayhanti
atk-s0301a:64_2: attho. “Dhammadāyādā me, bhikkhave, bhavathā”tiādīsu mamāti attho. Idha pana “mayā
atk-s0301a:64_3: suta”nti ca “mama suta”nti ca atthadvaye yujjati.
atk-s0301a:65_0: Sutanti ayaṃ sutasaddo saupasaggo anupasaggo ca gamana-vissuta-kilinnaupacitānuyoga-sotaviññeyya-sotadvārānusāraviññātādianekatthappabhedo.
atk-s0301a:65_1: Tathā hissa – “senāya pasuto”tiādīsu gacchantoti attho. “Sutadhammassa passato”tiādīsu
atk-s0301a:65_3: “Tumhehi puññaṃ pasutaṃ anappaka”ntiādīsu upacitanti attho. “Ye jhānapasutā dhīrā”tiādīsu
atk-s0301a:65_4: jhānānuyuttāti attho. “Diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ muta”ntiādīsu sotaviññeyyanti attho. “Sutadharo
atk-s0301a:65_5: sutasannicayo”tiādīsu sotadvārānusāraviññātadharoti attho. Idha panassa sotadvārānusārena
atk-s0301a:65_6: upadhāritanti vā upadhāraṇanti vā attho. Me-saddassa hi mayāti atthe sati – “evaṃ
atk-s0301a:65_7: mayā sutaṃ, sotadvārānusārena upadhārita”nti yujjati. Mamāti atthe sati – “evaṃ mama
atk-s0301a:66_0: Evametesu tīsu padesu evanti sotaviññāṇādiviññāṇakiccanidassanaṃ. Meti vuttaviññāṇasamaṅgipuggalanidassanaṃ.
atk-s0301a:66_2: tassa sotadvārānusārena pavattāya viññāṇavīthiyā nānappakārena ārammaṇe pavattibhāvappakāsanaṃ.
atk-s0301a:66_3: Meti attappakāsanaṃ. Sutanti dhammappakāsanaṃ. Ayañhettha saṅkhepo – “nānappakārena
atk-s0301a:66_4: ārammaṇe pavattāya viññāṇavīthiyā mayā na aññaṃ kataṃ, idaṃ pana kataṃ, ayaṃ dhammo suto”ti.
atk-s0301a:67: Tathā evanti niddisitabbappakāsanaṃ. Meti puggalappakāsanaṃ. Sutanti puggalakiccappakāsanaṃ. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – “yaṃ suttaṃ niddisissāmi, taṃ mayā evaṃ suta”nti.
atk-s0301a:68_0: Tathā evanti yassa cittasantānassa nānākārappavattiyā nānatthabyañjanagahaṇaṃ hoti,
atk-s0301a:68_1: tassa nānākāraniddeso. Evanti hi ayaṃ ākārapaññatti. Meti kattuniddeso. Sutanti visayaniddeso.
atk-s0301a:68_2: Ettāvatā nānākārappavattena cittasantānena taṃsamaṅgino kattuvisaye gahaṇasanniṭṭhānaṃ kataṃ hoti.
atk-s0301a:69_0: Atha vā evanti puggalakiccaniddeso. Sutanti viññāṇakiccaniddeso. Meti ubhayakiccayuttapuggalaniddeso.
atk-s0301a:69_1: Ayaṃ panettha saṅkhepo – “mayā savanakiccaviññāṇasamaṅginā puggalena viññāṇavasena
atk-s0301a:70_0: Tattha evanti ca meti ca saccikaṭṭhaparamatthavasena avijjamānapaññatti. Kiñhettha
atk-s0301a:70_1: taṃ paramatthato atthi, yaṃ evanti vā meti vā niddesaṃ labhetha. Sutanti vijjamānapaññatti.
atk-s0301a:70_2: Yañhi taṃ ettha sotena upaladdhaṃ, taṃ paramatthato vijjamānanti. Tathā evanti ca
atk-s0301a:70_3: meti ca taṃ taṃ upādāya vattabbato upādāpaññatti. Sutanti diṭṭhādīni upanidhāya vattabbato upanidhāpaññatti.
atk-s0301a:71_0: Ettha ca evanti vacanena asammohaṃ dīpeti. Na hi sammūḷho nānappakārapaṭivedhasamattho
atk-s0301a:71_1: hoti. Sutanti vacanena sutassa asammosaṃ dīpeti. Yassa hi sutaṃ sammuṭṭhaṃ hoti,
atk-s0301a:71_2: na so kālantarena mayā sutanti paṭijānāti. Iccassa asammohena paññāsiddhi, asammosena
atk-s0301a:71_3: pana satisiddhi. Tattha paññāpubbaṅgamāya satiyā byañjanāvadhāraṇasamatthatā, satipubbaṅgamāya
atk-s0301a:72_0: Aparo nayo – evanti vacanena yoniso manasikāraṃ dīpeti, ayoniso manasikaroto hi nānappakārapaṭivedhābhāvato.
atk-s0301a:72_1: Sutanti vacanena avikkhepaṃ dīpeti vikkhittacittassa savanābhāvato. Tathā hi vikkhittacitto
atk-s0301a:72_2: puggalo sabbasampattiyā vuccamānopi “na mayā sutaṃ, puna bhaṇathā”ti bhaṇati. Yoniso
atk-s0301a:72_3: manasikārena cettha attasammāpaṇidhiṃ pubbe ca katapuññataṃ sādheti, sammā appaṇihitattassa
atk-s0301a:72_4: pubbe akatapuññassa vā tadabhāvato. Avikkhepena saddhammassavanaṃ sappurisūpanissayañca
atk-s0301a:72_5: sādheti. Na hi vikkhittacitto sotuṃ sakkoti, na ca sappurise anupanissayamānassa savanaṃ atthīti.
atk-s0301a:73_0: Aparo nayo – yasmā “evanti yassa cittasantānassa nānākārappavattiyā nānatthabyañjanaggahaṇaṃ
atk-s0301a:73_1: hoti, tassa nānākāraniddeso”ti vuttaṃ, so ca evaṃ bhaddako ākāro na sammā appaṇihitattano
atk-s0301a:73_2: pubbe akatapuññassa vā hoti, tasmā evanti iminā bhaddakena ākārena pacchimacakkadvayasampattimattano
atk-s0301a:73_3: dīpeti. Sutanti savanayogena purimacakkadvayasampattiṃ. Na hi appatirūpadese vasato
atk-s0301a:73_4: sappurisūpanissayavirahitassa vā savanaṃ atthi. Iccassa pacchimacakkadvayasiddhiyā
atk-s0301a:73_5: āsayasuddhi siddhā hoti, purimacakkadvayasiddhiyā payogasuddhi, tāya ca āsayasuddhiyā
atk-s0301a:73_6: adhigamabyattisiddhi, payogasuddhiyā āgamabyattisiddhi. Iti payogāsayasuddhassa āgamādhigamasampannassa
atk-s0301a:73_7: vacanaṃ aruṇuggaṃ viya sūriyassa udayato, yoniso manasikāro viya ca kusalakammassa,
atk-s0301a:73_8: arahati bhagavato vacanassa pubbaṅgamaṃ bhavitunti ṭhāne nidānaṃ ṭhapento evaṃ me sutantiādimāha.
atk-s0301a:74_0: Aparo nayo – evanti iminā nānappakārapaṭivedhadīpakena vacanena attano atthapaṭibhānapaṭisambhidāsampattisabbhāvaṃ
atk-s0301a:74_2: Evanti ca idaṃ yoniso manasikāradīpakavacanaṃ bhāsamāno – “ete mayā dhammā manasānupekkhitā
atk-s0301a:74_3: diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhā”ti dīpeti. Sutanti idaṃ savanayogadīpakavacanaṃ bhāsamāno
atk-s0301a:74_4: – “bahū mayā dhammā sutā dhātā vacasā paricitā”ti dīpeti. Tadubhayenapi atthabyañjanapāripūriṃ
atk-s0301a:74_5: dīpento savane ādaraṃ janeti. Atthabyañjanaparipuṇṇañhi dhammaṃ ādarena assuṇanto
atk-s0301a:74_6: mahatā hitā paribāhiro hotīti ādaraṃ janetvā sakkaccaṃ dhammo sotabboti.
atk-s0301a:75_0: Evaṃ me sutanti iminā pana sakalena vacanena āyasmā ānando tathāgatappaveditaṃ dhammaṃ
atk-s0301a:75_1: attano adahanto asappurisabhūmiṃ atikkamati, sāvakattaṃ paṭijānanto sappurisabhūmiṃ
atk-s0301a:75_2: okkamati. Tathā asaddhammā cittaṃ vuṭṭhāpeti, saddhamme cittaṃ patiṭṭhāpeti. “Kevalaṃ
atk-s0301a:75_3: sutamevetaṃ mayā, tasseva pana bhagavato vacana”nti dīpento attānaṃ parimoceti, satthāraṃ
atk-s0301a:76_0: Apica “evaṃ me suta”nti attanā uppāditabhāvaṃ appaṭijānanto purimavacanaṃ vivaranto
atk-s0301a:76_1: – “sammukhā paṭiggahitamidaṃ mayā tassa bhagavato catuvesārajjavisāradassa dasabaladharassa
atk-s0301a:76_4: vacanaṃ, na ettha atthe vā dhamme vā pade vā byañjane vā kaṅkhā vā vimati vā kattabbā”ti
atk-s0301a:76_5: sabbadevamanussānaṃ imasmiṃ dhamme assaddhiyaṃ vināseti, saddhāsampadaṃ uppādetīti. Tenetaṃ vuccati –
atk-s0301a:79: Ekanti gaṇanaparicchedaniddeso. Samayanti paricchinnaniddeso. Ekaṃ samayanti aniyamitaparidīpanaṃ. Tattha samayasaddo –
atk-s0301a:81: Paṭilābhe pahāne ca, paṭivedhe ca dissati”.
atk-s0301a:82_0: Tathā hissa “appeva nāma svepi upasaṅkameyyāma kālañca samayañca upādāyā”ti evamādīsu
atk-s0301a:82_1: samavāyo attho. “Ekova kho, bhikkhave, khaṇo ca samayo ca brahmacariyavāsāyā”tiādīsu
atk-s0301a:82_3: “Samayopi kho te, bhaddāli, appaṭividdho ahosi, bhagavā kho sāvatthiyaṃ viharati,
atk-s0301a:82_4: bhagavāpi maṃ jānissati – ‘bhaddāli, nāma bhikkhu satthusāsane sikkhāya aparipūrakārī’ti.
atk-s0301a:82_5: Ayampi kho te, bhaddāli, samayo appaṭividdho ahosī”tiādīsu hetu. “Tena kho pana samayena
atk-s0301a:82_6: uggāhamāno paribbājako samaṇamuṇḍikāputto samayappavādake tindukācīre ekasālake mallikāya
atk-s0301a:83: “Diṭṭhe dhamme ca yo attho, yo cattho samparāyiko;
atk-s0301a:85_0: Ādīsu paṭilābho. “Sammā mānābhisamayā antamakāsi dukkhassā”tiādīsu pahānaṃ. “Dukkhassa
atk-s0301a:85_1: pīḷanaṭṭho saṅkhataṭṭho santāpaṭṭho vipariṇāmaṭṭho abhisamayaṭṭho”tiādīsu paṭivedho.
atk-s0301a:86_0: Tattha kiñcāpi etesu saṃvaccharādīsu samayesu yaṃ yaṃ suttaṃ yasmiṃ yasmiṃ saṃvacchare
atk-s0301a:86_1: utumhi māse pakkhe rattibhāge divasabhāge vā vuttaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ therassa suviditaṃ
atk-s0301a:86_2: suvavatthāpitaṃ paññāya. Yasmā pana “evaṃ me sutaṃ asukasaṃvacchare asukautumhi asukamāse
atk-s0301a:86_3: asukapakkhe asukarattibhāge asukadivasabhāge vā”ti evaṃ vutte na sakkā sukhena dhāretuṃ
atk-s0301a:86_4: vā uddisituṃ vā uddisāpetuṃ vā, bahu ca vattabbaṃ hoti, tasmā ekeneva padena tamatthaṃ
atk-s0301a:87_0: Ye vā ime gabbhokkantisamayo jātisamayo saṃvegasamayo abhinikkhamanasamayo dukkarakārikasamayo
atk-s0301a:87_2: evamādayo bhagavato devamanussesu ativiya suppakāsā anekakālappabhedā eva samayā.
atk-s0301a:87_3: Tesu samayesu desanāsamayasaṅkhātaṃ ekaṃ samayanti dīpeti. Yo cāyaṃ ñāṇakaruṇākiccasamayesu
atk-s0301a:88_0: Kasmā panettha yathā abhidhamme “yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacara”nti ca ito aññesu suttapadesu
atk-s0301a:88_1: “yasmiṃ samaye, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vivicceva kāmehī”ti ca bhummavacanena niddeso
atk-s0301a:88_2: kato, vinaye ca “tena samayena buddho bhagavā”ti karaṇavacanena, tathā akatvā “ekaṃ
atk-s0301a:88_3: samaya”nti upayogavacanena niddeso katoti. Tattha tathā, idha ca aññathā atthasambhavato.
atk-s0301a:88_4: Tattha hi abhidhamme ito aññesu suttapadesu ca adhikaraṇattho bhāvenabhāvalakkhaṇattho
atk-s0301a:88_5: ca sambhavati. Adhikaraṇañhi kālattho samūhattho ca samayo, tattha vuttānaṃ phassādidhammānaṃ
atk-s0301a:88_6: khaṇasamavāyahetusaṅkhātassa ca samayassa bhāvena tesaṃ bhāvo lakkhīyati. Tasmā tadatthajotanatthaṃ
atk-s0301a:89_0: Vinaye ca hetuattho karaṇattho ca sambhavati. Yo hi so sikkhāpadapaññattisamayo sāriputtādīhipi
atk-s0301a:89_1: dubbiññeyyo, tena samayena hetubhūtena karaṇabhūtena ca sikkhāpadāni paññāpayanto
atk-s0301a:89_2: sikkhāpadapaññattihetuñca apekkhamāno bhagavā tattha tattha vihāsi. Tasmā tadatthajotanatthaṃ
atk-s0301a:90_0: Idha pana aññasmiṃ ca evaṃjātike accantasaṃyogattho sambhavati. Yañhi samayaṃ bhagavā
atk-s0301a:90_1: imaṃ aññaṃ vā suttantaṃ desesi, accantameva taṃ samayaṃ karuṇāvihārena vihāsi. Tasmā
atk-s0301a:93: Aññatra samayo vutto, upayogena so idhā”ti.
atk-s0301a:94_0: Porāṇā pana vaṇṇayanti – “tasmiṃ samaye”ti vā “tena samayenā”ti vā “ekaṃ samaya”nti
atk-s0301a:94_1: vā abhilāpamattabhedo esa, sabbattha bhummameva atthoti. Tasmā “ekaṃ samaya”nti vuttepi
atk-s0301a:95: Bhagavāti garu. Garuṃ hi loke “bhagavā”ti vadanti. Ayañca sabbaguṇavisiṭṭhatāya sabbasattānaṃ garu, tasmā “bhagavā”ti veditabbo. Porāṇehipi vuttaṃ –
atk-s0301a:97: Garu gāravayutto so, bhagavā tena vuccatī”ti. ;
atk-s0301a:101: Imissā gāthāya vasenassa padassa vitthārato attho veditabbo. So ca visuddhimagge buddhānussatiniddese vuttoyeva.
atk-s0301a:102_0: Ettāvatā cettha evaṃ me sutanti vacanena yathāsutaṃ dhammaṃ dassento bhagavato dhammasarīraṃ
atk-s0301a:102_1: paccakkhaṃ karoti. Tena “nayidaṃ atikkantasatthukaṃ pāvacanaṃ, ayaṃ vo satthā”ti
atk-s0301a:102_2: satthu adassanena ukkaṇṭhitaṃ janaṃ samassāseti. Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavāti vacanena
atk-s0301a:102_3: tasmiṃ samaye bhagavato avijjamānabhāvaṃ dassento rūpakāyaparinibbānaṃ sādheti. Tena
atk-s0301a:102_4: “evaṃvidhassa nāma ariyadhammassa desako dasabaladharo vajirasaṅghātasamānakāyo sopi
atk-s0301a:102_5: bhagavā parinibbuto, kena aññena jīvite āsā janetabbā”ti jīvitamadamattaṃ janaṃ saṃvejeti,
atk-s0301a:102_6: saddhamme cassa ussāhaṃ janeti. Evanti ca bhaṇanto desanāsampattiṃ niddisati. Me
atk-s0301a:102_7: sutanti sāvakasampattiṃ. Ekaṃ samayanti kālasampattiṃ. Bhagavāti desakasampattiṃ.
atk-s0301a:103_0: Sāvatthiyanti evaṃnāmake nagare. Samīpatthe cetaṃ bhummavacanaṃ. Viharatīti avisesena
atk-s0301a:103_3: tena ṭhitopi gacchantopi nisinnopi sayānopi bhagavā viharaticceva veditabbo. So hi
atk-s0301a:103_4: ekaṃ iriyāpathabādhanaṃ aññena iriyāpathena vicchinditvā aparipatantaṃ attabhāvaṃ
atk-s0301a:104_0: Jetavaneti jetassa rājakumārassa vane. Tañhi tena ropitaṃ saṃvaḍḍhitaṃ paripālitaṃ
atk-s0301a:104_1: ahosi, tasmā “jetavana”nti saṅkhaṃ gataṃ. Tasmiṃ jetavane. Anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāmeti
atk-s0301a:104_3: niyyātitattā “anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāmo”ti saṅkhaṃ gate ārāme. Ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthāro
atk-s0301a:105_0: Tattha siyā – yadi tāva bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati, “jetavane”ti na vattabbaṃ.
atk-s0301a:105_1: Atha tattha viharati, “sāvatthiya”nti na vattabbaṃ. Na hi sakkā ubhayattha ekaṃ samayaṃ
atk-s0301a:105_2: viharitunti. Na kho panetaṃ evaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0301a:106_0: Nanu avocumha “samīpatthe bhummavacana”nti. Tasmā yathā gaṅgāyamunādīnaṃ samīpe goyūthāni
atk-s0301a:106_1: carantāni “gaṅgāyaṃ caranti, yamunāyaṃ carantī”ti vuccati, evamidhāpi yadidaṃ sāvatthiyā
atk-s0301a:106_2: samīpe jetavanaṃ, tattha viharanto vuccati “sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane”ti. Gocaragāmanidassanatthaṃ
atk-s0301a:107_0: Aññatarā devatāti nāmagottavasena apākaṭā ekā devatāti attho. “Abhijānāti no, bhante,
atk-s0301a:107_1: bhagavā ahu ñātaññatarassa mahesakkhassa yakkhassa saṃkhittena taṇhāsaṅkhayavimuttiṃ
atk-s0301a:107_2: bhāsitā”ti ettha pana abhiññāto sakkopi devarājā “aññataro”ti vutto. “Devatā”ti ca
atk-s0301a:107_3: idaṃ devānampi devadhītānampi sādhāraṇavacanaṃ. Imasmiṃ panatthe devo adhippeto,
atk-s0301a:107_4: so ca kho rūpāvacarānaṃ devānaṃ aññataro.
atk-s0301a:108_1: dissati. Tattha “abhikkantā, bhante, ratti, nikkhanto paṭhamo yāmo, ciranisinno bhikkhusaṅgho,
atk-s0301a:108_2: uddisatu, bhante, bhagavā bhikkhūnaṃ pātimokkha”nti evamādīsu khaye dissati. “Ayaṃ
atk-s0301a:108_3: imesaṃ catunnaṃ puggalānaṃ abhikkantataro ca paṇītataro cā”ti evamādīsu sundare.
atk-s0301a:109: “Ko me vandati pādāni, iddhiyā yasasā jalaṃ;
atk-s0301a:111_0: Evamādīsu abhirūpe. “Abhikkantaṃ bho gotama, abhikkantaṃ bho gotamā”ti evamādīsu
atk-s0301a:111_1: abbhānumodane. Idha pana khaye. Tena abhikkantāya rattiyā, parikkhīṇāya rattiyāti
atk-s0301a:111_2: vuttaṃ hoti. Tatthāyaṃ devaputto majjhimayāmasamanantare āgatoti veditabbo. Niyāmo
atk-s0301a:111_3: hi kiresa devatānaṃ yadidaṃ buddhānaṃ vā buddhasāvakānaṃ vā upaṭṭhānaṃ āgacchantā
atk-s0301a:112_0: Abhikkantavaṇṇāti idha abhikkanta-saddo abhirūpe, vaṇṇa-saddo pana chavithuti-kulavagga-kāraṇa-saṇṭhānappamāṇa-rūpāyatanādīsu
atk-s0301a:112_1: dissati. Tattha “suvaṇṇavaṇṇosi bhagavā”ti evamādīsu chaviyā. “Kadā saññūḷhā pana
atk-s0301a:112_2: te, gahapati, ime samaṇassa vaṇṇā”ti evamādīsu thutiyaṃ. “Cattārome, bho gotama,
atk-s0301a:112_3: vaṇṇā”ti evamādīsu kulavagge. “Atha kena nu vaṇṇena, gandhathenoti vuccatī”ti evamādīsu
atk-s0301a:112_4: kāraṇe. “Mahantaṃ hatthirājavaṇṇaṃ abhinimminitvā”ti evamādīsu saṇṭhāne. “Tayo pattassa
atk-s0301a:112_5: vaṇṇā”ti evamādīsu pamāṇe. “Vaṇṇo gandho raso ojā”ti evamādīsu rūpāyatane. So idha
atk-s0301a:112_6: chaviyā daṭṭhabbo. Tena abhikkantavaṇṇā abhirūpacchavi, iṭṭhavaṇṇā manāpavaṇṇāti
atk-s0301a:112_7: vuttaṃ hoti. Devatā hi manussalokaṃ āgacchamānā pakativaṇṇaṃ pakatiiddhiṃ jahitvā
atk-s0301a:112_8: oḷārikaṃ attabhāvaṃ katvā atirekavaṇṇaṃ atirekaiddhiṃ māpetvā naṭasamajjādīni gacchantā
atk-s0301a:112_9: manussā viya abhisaṅkhatena kāyena āgacchanti. Tattha kāmāvacarā anabhisaṅkhatenapi
atk-s0301a:112_10: āgantuṃ sakkonti, rūpāvacarā pana na sakkonti. Tesañhi atisukhumo attabhāvo, na tena
atk-s0301a:112_11: iriyāpathakappanaṃ hoti. Tasmā ayaṃ devaputto abhisaṅkhateneva āgato. Tena vuttaṃ
atk-s0301a:113_1: Tathā hissa “kevalaparipuṇṇaṃ parisuddhaṃ brahmacariya”nti evamādīsu anavasesatthamattho.
atk-s0301a:113_2: “Kevalakappā ca aṅgamagadhā pahūtaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ ādāya upasaṅkamissantī”ti
atk-s0301a:113_3: evamādīsu yebhuyyatā. “Kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hotī”ti evamādīsu abyāmissatā.
atk-s0301a:113_4: “Kevalaṃ saddhāmattakaṃ nūna ayamāyasmā”ti evamādīsu anatirekatā. “Āyasmato, bhante,
atk-s0301a:113_5: anuruddhassa bāhiyo nāma saddhivihāriko kevalakappaṃ saṅghabhedāya ṭhito”ti evamādīsu
atk-s0301a:113_6: daḷhatthatā. “Kevalī vusitavā uttamapurisoti vuccatī”ti evamādīsu visaṃyogo attho.
atk-s0301a:114_1: Tathā hissa “okappaniyametaṃ bhoto gotamassa, yathā taṃ arahato sammāsambuddhassā”ti
atk-s0301a:114_2: evamādīsu abhisaddahanamattho. “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, pañcahi samaṇakappehi phalaṃ
atk-s0301a:114_3: paribhuñjitu”nti evamādīsu vohāro. “Yena sudaṃ niccakappaṃ viharāmī”ti evamādīsu
atk-s0301a:114_4: kālo. “Iccāyasmā kappo”ti evamādīsu paññatti. “Alaṅkato kappitakesamassū”ti evamādīsu
atk-s0301a:114_5: chedanaṃ. “Kappati dvaṅgulakappo”ti evamādīsu vikappo. “Ātthi kappo nipajjitu”nti
atk-s0301a:114_6: evamādīsu leso. “Kevalakappaṃ veḷuvanaṃ obhāsetvā”ti evamādīsu samantabhāvo. Idha
atk-s0301a:114_7: panassa samantabhāvattho adhippeto. Tasmā kevalakappaṃ jetavananti ettha “anavasesaṃ
atk-s0301a:115: Obhāsetvāti vatthālaṅkārasarīrasamuṭṭhitāya ābhāya pharitvā, candimā viya sūriyo viya ca ekobhāsaṃ ekapajjotaṃ karitvāti attho.
atk-s0301a:116_0: Yenāti bhummatthe karaṇavacanaṃ. Yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamīti tasmā “yattha bhagavā,
atk-s0301a:116_1: tattha upasaṅkamī”ti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Yena vā kāraṇena bhagavā devamanussehi
atk-s0301a:116_2: upasaṅkamitabbo, tena kāraṇena upasaṅkamīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Kena ca kāraṇena
atk-s0301a:116_4: dijagaṇehi niccaphalitamahārukkho viya. Upasaṅkamīti ca gatāti vuttaṃ hoti. Upasaṅkamitvāti
atk-s0301a:116_5: upasaṅkamanapariyosānadīpanaṃ. Atha vā evaṃ gatā tato āsannataraṃ ṭhānaṃ bhagavato
atk-s0301a:117_0: Idāni yenatthena loke aggapuggalassa upaṭṭhānaṃ āgatā, taṃ pucchitukāmā dasanakhasamodhānasamujjalaṃ
atk-s0301a:117_1: añjuliṃ sirasi patiṭṭhapetvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi. Ekamantanti bhāvanapuṃsakaniddeso
atk-s0301a:117_2: – “visamaṃ candimasūriyā parivattantī”tiādīsu viya. Tasmā yathā ṭhitā ekamantaṃ ṭhitā
atk-s0301a:117_3: hoti, tathā aṭṭhāsīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Bhummatthe vā etaṃ upayogavacanaṃ.
atk-s0301a:117_4: Aṭṭhāsīti ṭhānaṃ kappesi. Paṇḍitā hi devamanussā garuṭṭhāniyaṃ upasaṅkamitvā āsanakusalatāya
atk-s0301a:117_5: ekamantaṃ tiṭṭhanti, ayañca devo tesaṃ aññataro, tasmā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0301a:118_0: Kathaṃ ṭhito pana ekamantaṃ ṭhito hotīti? Cha ṭhānadose vajjetvā. Seyyathidaṃ – atidūraṃ,
atk-s0301a:118_1: accāsannaṃ, uparivātaṃ, unnatappadesaṃ, atisammukhaṃ, atipacchāti. Atidūre ṭhito
atk-s0301a:118_2: hi sace kathetukāmo hoti, uccāsaddena kathetabbaṃ hoti. Accāsanne ṭhito saṅghaṭṭanaṃ
atk-s0301a:118_3: karoti. Uparivāte ṭhito sarīragandhena bādhati. Unnatappadese ṭhito agāravaṃ pakāseti.
atk-s0301a:118_4: Atisammukhā ṭhito sace daṭṭhukāmo hoti, cakkhunā cakkhuṃ āhacca daṭṭhabbaṃ hoti.
atk-s0301a:118_5: Atipacchā ṭhito sace daṭṭhukāmo hoti, gīvaṃ pasāretvā daṭṭhabbaṃ hoti. Tasmā ayampi
atk-s0301a:118_6: ete cha ṭhānadose vajjetvā aṭṭhāsi. Tena vuttaṃ “ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsī”ti.
atk-s0301a:119_0: Etadavocāti etaṃ avoca. Kathaṃ nūti kāraṇapucchā. Bhagavato hi tiṇṇoghabhāvo dasasahassilokadhātuyā
atk-s0301a:119_1: pākaṭo, tenimissā devatāya tattha kaṅkhā natthi, iminā pana kāraṇena “tiṇṇo”ti na
atk-s0301a:119_2: jānāti, tena sā taṃ kāraṇaṃ pucchamānā evamāha.
atk-s0301a:120_0: Mārisāti devatānaṃ piyasamudācāravacanametaṃ. Niddukkhāti vuttaṃ hoti. Yadi evaṃ
atk-s0301a:120_1: “yadā kho te, mārisa, saṅkunā saṅku hadaye samāgaccheyya, atha naṃ tvaṃ jāneyyāsi
atk-s0301a:120_2: ‘vassasahassaṃ me niraye paccamānassā”’ti idaṃ virujjhati. Na hi nerayikasatto niddukkho
atk-s0301a:120_3: nāma hoti. Kiñcāpi na niddukkho, ruḷhīsaddena pana evaṃ vuccati. Pubbe kira paṭhamakappikānaṃ
atk-s0301a:120_4: niddukkhānaṃ sukhasamappitānaṃ esa vohāro, aparabhāge dukkhaṃ hotu vā mā vā, ruḷhīsaddena
atk-s0301a:120_5: ayaṃ vohāro vuccateva nippadumāpi nirudakāpi vā pokkharaṇī pokkharaṇī viya.
atk-s0301a:121_0: Oghamatarīti ettha cattāro oghā, kāmogho bhavogho diṭṭhogho avijjoghoti. Tattha pañcasu
atk-s0301a:121_1: kāmaguṇesu chandarāgo kāmogho nāma. Rūpārūpabhavesu chandarāgo jhānanikanti ca bhavogho
atk-s0301a:121_2: nāma. Dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhiyo diṭṭhogho nāma. Catūsu saccesu aññāṇaṃ avijjogho nāma. Tattha
atk-s0301a:121_3: kāmogho aṭṭhasu lobhasahagatesu cittuppādesu uppajjati, bhavogho catūsu diṭṭhigatavippayuttalobhasahagatesu
atk-s0301a:121_4: cittuppādesu uppajjati, diṭṭhogho catūsu diṭṭhigatasampayuttesu cittuppādesu uppajjati,
atk-s0301a:122_0: Sabbopi cesa avahananaṭṭhena rāsaṭṭhena ca oghoti veditabbo. Avahananaṭṭhenāti adhogamanaṭṭhena.
atk-s0301a:122_1: Ayañhi attano vasaṃ gate satte adho gameti, nirayādibhedāya duggatiyaṃyeva nibbatteti,
atk-s0301a:122_2: uparibhāvaṃ vā nibbānaṃ gantuṃ adento adho tīsu bhavesu catūsu yonīsu pañcasu gatīsu
atk-s0301a:122_3: sattasu viññāṇaṭṭhitīsu navasu sattāvāsesu ca gametītipi attho. Rāsaṭṭhenāti mahantaṭṭhena.
atk-s0301a:122_4: Mahā heso kilesarāsi avīcito paṭṭhāya yāva bhavaggā patthaṭo, yadidaṃ pañcasu kāmaguṇesu
atk-s0301a:122_5: chandarāgo nāma. Sesesupi eseva nayo. Evamayaṃ rāsaṭṭhenāpi oghoti veditabbo. Atarīti
atk-s0301a:122_6: imaṃ catubbidhampi oghaṃ kena nu tvaṃ, mārisa, kāraṇena tiṇṇoti pucchati.
atk-s0301a:123_0: Athassā bhagavā pañhaṃ vissajjento appatiṭṭhaṃ khvāhantiādimāha. Tattha appatiṭṭhanti
atk-s0301a:123_1: appatiṭṭhahanto. Anāyūhanti anāyūhanto, avāyamantoti attho. Iti bhagavā gūḷhaṃ paṭicchannaṃ
atk-s0301a:123_2: katvā pañhaṃ kathesi. Devatāpi naṃ sutvā “bāhirakaṃ tāva oghaṃ tarantā nāma ṭhātabbaṭṭhāne
atk-s0301a:123_3: tiṭṭhantā taritabbaṭṭhāne āyūhantā taranti, ayaṃ pana avīcito yāva bhavaggā patthaṭaṃ
atk-s0301a:123_4: kilesoghaṃ kilesarāsiṃ appatiṭṭhahanto anāyūhanto atarinti āha. Kiṃ nu kho etaṃ?
atk-s0301a:123_5: Kathaṃ nu kho eta”nti? Vimatiṃ pakkhantā pañhassa atthaṃ na aññāsi.
atk-s0301a:124_0: Kiṃ pana bhagavatā yathā sattā na jānanti, evaṃ kathanatthāya pāramiyo pūretvā sabbaññutā
atk-s0301a:124_1: paṭividdhāti? Na etadatthāya paṭividdhā. Dve pana bhagavato desanā niggahamukhena
atk-s0301a:124_2: ca anuggahamukhena ca. Tattha ye paṇḍitamānino honti aññātepi ñātasaññino pañcasatā
atk-s0301a:124_3: brāhmaṇapabbajitā viya, tesaṃ mānaniggahatthaṃ yathā na jānanti, evaṃ mūlapariyāyādisadisaṃ
atk-s0301a:124_4: dhammaṃ deseti. Ayaṃ niggahamukhena desanā. Vuttampi cetaṃ “niggayha niggayhāhaṃ,
atk-s0301a:124_5: ānanda, vakkhāmi, pavayha pavayha, ānanda, vakkhāmi, yo sāro, so ṭhassatī”ti. Ye
atk-s0301a:124_6: pana ujukā sikkhākāmā, tesaṃ suviññeyyaṃ katvā ākaṅkheyyasuttādisadisaṃ dhammaṃ deseti,
atk-s0301a:124_7: “abhirama, tissa, abhirama, tissa, ahamovādena ahamanuggahena ahamanusāsaniyā”ti
atk-s0301a:124_8: ca ne samassāseti. Ayaṃ anuggahamukhena desanā.
atk-s0301a:125_0: Ayaṃ pana devaputto mānatthaddho paṇḍitamānī, evaṃ kirassa ahosi – ahaṃ oghaṃ jānāmi,
atk-s0301a:125_1: tathāgatassa oghatiṇṇabhāvaṃ jānāmi, “iminā pana kāraṇena tiṇṇo”ti ettakamattaṃ na
atk-s0301a:125_2: jānāmi. Iti mayhaṃ ñātameva bahu, appaṃ aññātaṃ, tamahaṃ kathitamattameva jānissāmi.
atk-s0301a:125_3: Kiñhi nāma taṃ bhagavā vadeyya, yassāhaṃ atthaṃ na jāneyyanti. Atha satthā “ayaṃ
atk-s0301a:125_4: kiliṭṭhavatthaṃ viya raṅgajātaṃ abhabbo imaṃ mānaṃ appahāya desanaṃ sampaṭicchituṃ,
atk-s0301a:125_5: mānaniggahaṃ tāvassa katvā puna nīcacittena pucchantassa pakāsessāmī”ti paṭicchannaṃ
atk-s0301a:125_6: katvā pañhaṃ kathesi. Sopi nihatamāno ahosi, sā cassa nihatamānatā uttaripañhapucchaneneva
atk-s0301a:125_7: veditabbā. Tassa pana pañhapucchanassa ayamattho – kathaṃ pana tvaṃ, mārisa, appatiṭṭhaṃ
atk-s0301a:125_8: anāyūhaṃ oghamatari, yathāhaṃ jānāmi, evaṃ me kathehīti.
atk-s0301a:126_0: Athassa bhagavā kathento yadāsvāhantiādimāha. Tattha yadā svāhanti yasmiṃ kāle ahaṃ.
atk-s0301a:126_1: Sukāro nipātamattaṃ. Yathā ca ettha, evaṃ sabbapadesu. Saṃsīdāmīti paṭicchannaṃ katvā
atk-s0301a:126_2: ataranto tattheva osīdāmi. Nibbuyhāmīti ṭhātuṃ asakkonto ativattāmi. Iti ṭhāne ca
atk-s0301a:126_3: vāyāme ca dosaṃ disvā atiṭṭhanto avāyamanto oghamatarinti evaṃ bhagavatā pañho kathito.
atk-s0301a:126_4: Devatāyapi paṭividdho, na pana pākaṭo, tassa pākaṭīkaraṇatthaṃ satta dukā dassitā.
atk-s0301a:126_5: Kilesavasena hi santiṭṭhanto saṃsīdati nāma, abhisaṅkhāravasena āyūhanto nibbuyhati
atk-s0301a:126_6: nāma. Taṇhādiṭṭhīhi vā santiṭṭhanto saṃsīdati nāma, avasesakilesānañceva abhisaṅkhārānañca
atk-s0301a:126_7: vasena āyūhanto nibbuyhati nāma. Taṇhāvasena vā santiṭṭhanto saṃsīdati nāma, diṭṭhivasena
atk-s0301a:126_8: āyūhanto nibbuyhati nāma. Sassatadiṭṭhiyā vā santiṭṭhanto saṃsīdati nāma, ucchedadiṭṭhiyā
atk-s0301a:126_9: āyūhanto nibbuyhati nāma. Olīyanābhinivesā hi bhavadiṭṭhi, atidhāvanābhinivesā vibhavadiṭṭhi.
atk-s0301a:126_10: Līnavasena vā santiṭṭhanto saṃsīdati nāma, uddhaccavasena āyūhanto nibbuyhati nāma.
atk-s0301a:126_11: Tathā kāmasukhallikānuyogavasena santiṭṭhanto saṃsīdati nāma, attakilamathānuyogavasena
atk-s0301a:126_12: āyūhanto nibbuyhati nāma. Sabbākusalābhisaṅkhāravasena santiṭṭhanto saṃsīdati nāma,
atk-s0301a:126_13: sabbalokiyakusalābhisaṅkhāravasena āyūhanto nibbuyhati nāma. Vuttampi cetaṃ – “seyyathāpi,
atk-s0301a:126_14: cunda, ye keci akusalā dhammā, sabbe te adhobhāgaṅgamanīyā, ye keci kusalā dhammā,
atk-s0301a:127_0: Imaṃ pañhavissajjanaṃ sutvāva devatā sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāya tuṭṭhā pasannā attano
atk-s0301a:127_1: tuṭṭhiñca pasādañca pakāsayantī cirassaṃ vatāti gāthamāha. Tattha cirassanti cirassa
atk-s0301a:127_2: kālassa accayenāti attho. Ayaṃ kira devatā kassapasammāsambuddhaṃ disvā tassa parinibbānato
atk-s0301a:127_3: paṭṭhāya antarā aññaṃ buddhaṃ na diṭṭhapubbā, tasmā ajja bhagavantaṃ disvā evamāha.
atk-s0301a:127_4: Kiṃ panimāya devatāya ito pubbe satthā na diṭṭhapubboti. Diṭṭhapubbo vā hotu adiṭṭhapubbo
atk-s0301a:127_5: vā, dassanaṃ upādāya evaṃ vattuṃ vaṭṭati. Brāhmaṇanti bāhitapāpaṃ khīṇāsavabrāhmaṇaṃ.
atk-s0301a:127_6: Parinibbutanti kilesanibbānena nibbutaṃ. Loketi sattaloke. Visattikanti rūpādīsu
atk-s0301a:127_7: ārammaṇesu āsattavisattatādīhi kāraṇehi visattikā vuccati taṇhā, taṃ visattikaṃ appatiṭṭhamānaṃ
atk-s0301a:127_8: anāyūhamānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ nittiṇṇaṃ uttiṇṇaṃ cirassaṃ vata khīṇāsavabrāhmaṇaṃ passāmīti attho.
atk-s0301a:128_0: Samanuñño satthā ahosīti tassā devatāya vacanaṃ citteneva samanumodi, ekajjhāsayo
atk-s0301a:128_1: ahosi. Antaradhāyīti abhisaṅkhatakāyaṃ jahitvā attano pakatiupādiṇṇakakāyasmiṃyeva
atk-s0301a:128_2: ṭhatvā laddhāsā laddhapatiṭṭhā hutvā dasabalaṃ gandhehi ca mālehi ca pūjetvā attano
atk-s0301a:131_0: 2. Idāni dutiyasuttato paṭṭhāya paṭhamamāgatañca uttānatthañca pahāya yaṃ yaṃ anuttānaṃ,
atk-s0301a:131_1: taṃ tadeva vaṇṇayissāma. Jānāsi noti jānāsi nu. Nimokkhantiādīni maggādīnaṃ nāmāni.
atk-s0301a:131_2: Maggena hi sattā kilesabandhanato nimuccanti, tasmā maggo sattānaṃ nimokkhoti vutto.
atk-s0301a:131_3: Phalakkhaṇe pana te kilesabandhanato pamuttā, tasmā phalaṃ sattānaṃ pamokkhoti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0301a:131_4: Nibbānaṃ patvā sattānaṃ sabbadukkhaṃ viviccati, tasmā nibbānaṃ vivekoti vuttaṃ. Sabbāni
atk-s0301a:131_5: vā etāni nibbānasseva nāmāni. Nibbānañhi patvā sattā sabbadukkhato nimuccanti pamuccanti
atk-s0301a:131_6: viviccanti, tasmā tadeva “nimokkho pamokkho viveko”ti vuttaṃ. Jānāmi khvāhanti jānāmi
atk-s0301a:131_7: kho ahaṃ. Avadhāraṇattho khokāro. Ahaṃ jānāmiyeva. Sattānaṃ nimokkhādijānanatthameva
atk-s0301a:131_8: hi mayā samatiṃsa pāramiyo pūretvā sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ paṭividdhanti sīhanādaṃ nadati.
atk-s0301a:132_0: Nandībhavaparikkhayāti nandīmūlakassa kammabhavassa parikkhayena. Nandiyā ca bhavassa
atk-s0301a:132_1: cātipi vaṭṭati. Tattha hi purimanaye nandībhavena tividhakammābhisaṅkhāravasena saṅkhārakkhandho
atk-s0301a:132_2: gahito, saññāviññāṇehi taṃsampayuttā ca dve khandhā. Tehi pana tīhi khandhehi sampayuttā
atk-s0301a:132_3: vedanā tesaṃ gahaṇena gahitāvāti anupādiṇṇakānaṃ catunnaṃ arūpakkhandhānaṃ appavattivasena
atk-s0301a:132_4: saupādisesaṃ nibbānaṃ kathitaṃ hoti. Vedanānaṃ nirodhā upasamāti upādiṇṇakavedanānaṃ
atk-s0301a:132_5: nirodhena ca upasamena ca. Tattha vedanāgahaṇena taṃsampayuttā tayo khandhā gahitāva
atk-s0301a:132_6: honti, tesaṃ vatthārammaṇavasena rūpakkhandhopi. Evaṃ imesaṃ upādiṇṇakānaṃ pañcannaṃ
atk-s0301a:132_7: khandhānaṃ appavattivasena anupādisesaṃ nibbānaṃ kathitaṃ hoti. Dutiyanaye pana nandiggahaṇena
atk-s0301a:132_8: saṅkhārakkhandho gahito, bhavaggahaṇena upapattibhavasaṅkhāto rūpakkhandho, saññādīhi
atk-s0301a:132_9: sarūpeneva tayo khandhā. Evaṃ imesaṃ pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ appavattivasena nibbānaṃ
atk-s0301a:132_10: kathitaṃ hotīti veditabbaṃ. Imameva ca nayaṃ catunikāyikabhaṇḍikatthero roceti. Iti
atk-s0301a:135_0: 3. Tatiye upanīyatīti parikkhīyati nirujjhati, upagacchati vā, anupubbena maraṇaṃ
atk-s0301a:135_1: upetīti attho. Yathā vā gopālena gogaṇo nīyati, evaṃ jarāya maraṇasantikaṃ upanīyatīti
atk-s0301a:135_2: attho. Jīvitanti jīvitindriyaṃ. Appanti parittaṃ thokaṃ. Tassa dvīhākārehi parittatā
atk-s0301a:135_3: veditabbā sarasaparittatāya ca khaṇaparittatāya ca. Sarasaparittatāyapi hi “yo, bhikkhave,
atk-s0301a:135_4: ciraṃ jīvati, so vassasataṃ appaṃ vā bhiyyo”ti vacanato parittaṃ. Khaṇaparittatāyapi.
atk-s0301a:135_5: Paramatthato hi atiparitto sattānaṃ jīvitakkhaṇo ekacittappavattimattoyeva. Yathā
atk-s0301a:135_6: nāma rathacakkaṃ pavattamānampi ekeneva nemippadesena pavattati, tiṭṭhamānampi ekeneva
atk-s0301a:135_7: tiṭṭhati, evamevaṃ ekacittakkhaṇikaṃ sattānaṃ jīvitaṃ, tasmiṃ citte niruddhamatte
atk-s0301a:135_8: satto niruddhoti vuccati. Yathāha – atīte cittakkhaṇe jīvittha na jīvati na jīvissati,
atk-s0301a:135_9: anāgate cittakkhaṇe jīvissati na jīvati na jīvittha, paccuppanne cittakkhaṇe jīvati
atk-s0301a:142_0: Jarūpanītassāti jaraṃ upagatassa, jarāya vā maraṇasantikaṃ upanītassa. Na santi tāṇāti
atk-s0301a:142_1: tāṇaṃ leṇaṃ saraṇaṃ bhavituṃ samatthā nāma keci natthi. Etaṃ bhayanti etaṃ jīvitindriyassa
atk-s0301a:142_2: maraṇūpagamanaṃ, āyuparittatā, jarūpanītassa tāṇābhāvoti tividhaṃ bhayaṃ bhayavatthu
atk-s0301a:142_3: bhayakāraṇanti attho. Puññāni kayirātha sukhāvahānīti viññū puriso sukhāvahāni sukhadāyakāni
atk-s0301a:142_4: puññāni kareyya. Iti devatā rūpāvacarajjhānaṃ sandhāya pubbacetanaṃ aparacetanaṃ
atk-s0301a:142_5: muñcacetanañca gahetvā bahuvacanavasena “puññānī”ti āha. Jhānassādaṃ jhānanikantiṃ
atk-s0301a:142_6: jhānasukhañca gahetvā “sukhāvahānī”ti āha. Tassā kira devatāya sayaṃ dīghāyukaṭṭhāne
atk-s0301a:142_7: brahmaloke nibbattattā heṭṭhā kāmāvacaradevesu parittāyukaṭṭhāne cavamāne upapajjamāne
atk-s0301a:142_8: ca thullaphusitake vuṭṭhipātasadise satte disvā etadahosi “ahovatime sattā jhānaṃ
atk-s0301a:143_0: Atha bhagavā – “ayaṃ devatā aniyyānikaṃ vaṭṭakathaṃ kathetī”ti vivaṭṭamassā dassento
atk-s0301a:143_1: dutiyaṃ gāthamāha. Tattha lokāmisanti dve lokāmisā pariyāyena ca nippariyāyena ca.
atk-s0301a:143_2: Pariyāyena tebhūmakavaṭṭaṃ lokāmisaṃ, nippariyāyena cattāro paccayā. Idha pariyāyalokāmisaṃ
atk-s0301a:143_3: adhippetaṃ. Nippariyāyalokāmisampi vaṭṭatiyeva. Santipekkhoti nibbānasaṅkhātaṃ accantasantiṃ
atk-s0301a:146_0: 4. Catutthe accentīti atikkamanti. Kālāti purebhattādayo kālā. Tarayanti rattiyoti
atk-s0301a:146_1: rattiyo atikkamamānā puggalaṃ maraṇūpagamanāya tarayanti sīghaṃ sīghaṃ gamayanti.
atk-s0301a:146_2: Vayoguṇāti paṭhamamajjhimapacchimavayānaṃ guṇā, rāsayoti attho. “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave,
atk-s0301a:146_3: ahatānaṃ vatthānaṃ diguṇaṃ saṅghāṭi”nti ettha hi paṭalaṭṭho guṇaṭṭho. “Sataguṇā dakkhiṇā
atk-s0301a:146_4: pāṭikaṅkhitabbā”ti ettha ānisaṃsaṭṭho. “Antaṃ antaguṇa”nti ettha koṭṭhāsaṭṭho. “Kayirā
atk-s0301a:146_5: mālāguṇe bahū”ti ettha rāsaṭṭho. “Pañca kāmaguṇā”ti ettha bandhanaṭṭho. Idha pana
atk-s0301a:146_6: rāsaṭṭho guṇaṭṭho. Tasmā vayoguṇāti vayorāsayo veditabbā. Anupubbaṃ jahantīti anupaṭipāṭiyā
atk-s0301a:146_7: puggalaṃ jahanti. Majjhimavaye ṭhitaṃ hi paṭhamavayo jahati, pacchimavaye ṭhitaṃ
atk-s0301a:146_8: dve paṭhamamajjhimā jahanti, maraṇakkhaṇe pana tayopi vayā jahanteva. Etaṃ bhayanti
atk-s0301a:146_9: etaṃ kālānaṃ atikkamanaṃ, rattidivānaṃ taritabhāvo, vayoguṇānaṃ jahanabhāvoti tividhaṃ
atk-s0301a:149_0: 5. Pañcame kati chindeti chindanto kati chindeyya. Sesapadesupi eseva nayo. Ettha
atk-s0301a:149_1: ca “chinde jahe”ti atthato ekaṃ. Gāthābandhassa pana maṭṭhabhāvatthaṃ ayaṃ devatā
atk-s0301a:149_2: saddapunaruttiṃ vajjayantī evamāha. Kati saṅgātigoti kati saṅge atigato, atikkantoti
atk-s0301a:149_3: attho. Saṅgātikotipi pāṭho, ayameva attho. Pañca chindeti chindanto pañca orambhāgiyasaṃyojanāni
atk-s0301a:149_4: chindeyya. Pañca jaheti jahanto pañcuddhambhāgiyasaṃyojanāni jaheyya. Idhāpi chindanañca
atk-s0301a:149_5: jahanañca atthato ekameva, bhagavā pana devatāya āropitavacanānurūpeneva evamāha.
atk-s0301a:149_6: Atha vā pādesu baddhapāsasakuṇo viya pañcorambhāgiyasaṃyojanāni heṭṭhā ākaḍḍhamānākārāni
atk-s0301a:149_7: honti, tāni anāgāmimaggena chindeyyāti vadati. Hatthehi gahitarukkhasākhā viya pañcuddhambhāgiyasaṃyojanāni
atk-s0301a:149_8: upari ākaḍḍhamānākārāni honti, tāni arahattamaggena jaheyyāti vadati. Pañca cuttari
atk-s0301a:149_9: bhāvayeti etesaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ chindanatthāya ceva pahānatthāya ca uttari atirekaṃ
atk-s0301a:149_10: visesaṃ bhāvento saddhāpañcamāni indriyāni bhāveyyāti attho. Pañca saṅgātigoti rāgasaṅgo
atk-s0301a:149_11: dosasaṅgo mohasaṅgo mānasaṅgo diṭṭhisaṅgoti ime pañca saṅge atikkanto. Oghatiṇṇoti
atk-s0301a:149_12: vuccatīti caturoghatiṇṇoti kathīyati. Imāya pana gāthāya pañcindriyāni lokiyalokuttarāni kathitānīti.
atk-s0301a:152_0: 6. Chaṭṭhe jāgaratanti jāgarantānaṃ. Pañca jāgaratanti vissajjanagāthāyaṃ pana saddhādīsu
atk-s0301a:152_1: pañcasu indriyesu jāgarantesu pañca nīvaraṇā suttā nāma. Kasmā? Yasmā taṃsamaṅgīpuggalo
atk-s0301a:152_2: yattha katthaci nisinno vā ṭhito vā aruṇaṃ uṭṭhapentopi pamādatāya akusalasamaṅgitāya
atk-s0301a:152_3: sutto nāma hoti. Evaṃ suttesu pañcasu nīvaraṇesu pañcindriyāni jāgarāni nāma. Kasmā?
atk-s0301a:152_4: Yasmā taṃsamaṅgīpuggalo yattha katthaci nipajjitvā niddāyantopi appamādatāya kusalasamaṅgitāya
atk-s0301a:152_5: jāgaro nāma hoti. Pañcahi pana nīvaraṇeheva kilesarajaṃ ādiyati gaṇhāti parāmasati.
atk-s0301a:152_6: Purimā hi kāmacchandādayo pacchimānaṃ paccayā hontīti pañcahi indriyehi parisujjhatīti
atk-s0301a:152_7: ayamattho veditabbo. Idhāpi pañcindriyāni lokiyalokuttarāneva kathitānīti.
atk-s0301a:155_0: 7. Sattame dhammāti catusaccadhammā. Appaṭividitāti ñāṇena appaṭividdhā. Paravādesūti
atk-s0301a:155_1: dvāsaṭṭhidiṭṭhigatavādesu. Te hi ito paresaṃ titthiyānaṃ vādattā paravādā nāma. Nīyareti
atk-s0301a:155_2: attano dhammatāyapi gacchanti, parenapi nīyanti. Tattha sayameva sassatādīni gaṇhantā
atk-s0301a:155_3: gacchanti nāma, parassa vacanena tāni gaṇhantā nīyanti nāma. Kālo tesaṃ pabujjhitunti
atk-s0301a:155_4: tesaṃ puggalānaṃ pabujjhituṃ ayaṃ kālo. Lokasmiñhi buddho uppanno, dhammo desiyati,
atk-s0301a:155_5: saṅgho suppaṭipanno, paṭipadā bhaddikā, ime ca pana mahājanā vaṭṭe suttā nappabujjhantīti
atk-s0301a:155_6: devatā āha. Sambuddhāti sammā hetunā kāraṇena buddhā. Cattāro hi buddhā – sabbaññubuddho,
atk-s0301a:155_7: paccekabuddho, catusaccabuddho, sutabuddhoti. Tattha samatiṃsapāramiyo pūretvā sammāsambodhiṃ
atk-s0301a:155_8: patto sabbaññubuddho nāma. Kappasatasahassādhikāni dve asaṅkhyeyyāni pāramiyo pūretvā
atk-s0301a:155_9: sayambhutaṃ patto paccekabuddho nāma. Avasesā khīṇāsavā catusaccabuddhā nāma. Bahussuto
atk-s0301a:155_10: sutabuddho nāma. Imasmiṃ atthe tayopi purimā vaṭṭanti. Sammadaññāti sammā hetunā
atk-s0301a:155_11: kāraṇena jānitvā. Caranti visame samanti visame vā lokasannivāse visame vā sattanikāye
atk-s0301a:158_0: 8. Aṭṭhame susammuṭṭhāti paññāya appaṭividdhabhāveneva sunaṭṭhā. Yathā hi dve khettāni
atk-s0301a:158_1: kasitvā, ekaṃ vapitvā, bahudhaññaṃ adhigatassa avāpitakhettato aladdhaṃ sandhāya
atk-s0301a:158_2: “bahuṃ me dhaññaṃ naṭṭha”nti vadanto aladdhameva “naṭṭha”nti vadati, evamidhāpi appaṭividitāva
atk-s0301a:158_3: susammuṭṭhā nāma. Asammuṭṭhāti paññāya paṭividdhabhāveneva anaṭṭhā. Sesaṃ purimasadisamevāti.
atk-s0301a:161_0: 9. Navame mānakāmassāti mānaṃ kāmentassa icchantassa. Damoti evarūpassa puggalassa
atk-s0301a:161_1: samādhipakkhiko damo natthīti vadati. “Saccena danto damasā upeto, vedantagū vusitabrahmacariyo”ti
atk-s0301a:161_2: ettha hi indriyasaṃvaro damoti vutto. “Yadi saccā damā cāgā, khantyā bhiyyodha vijjatī”ti
atk-s0301a:161_3: ettha paññā. “Dānena damena saṃyamena saccavajjena atthi puññaṃ, atthi puññassa āgamo”ti
atk-s0301a:161_4: ettha uposathakammaṃ. “Sakkhissasi kho tvaṃ, puṇṇa, iminā damūpasamena samannāgato
atk-s0301a:161_5: sunāparantasmiṃ janapade viharitu”nti ettha adhivāsanakhanti. Imasmiṃ pana sutte
atk-s0301a:161_6: damoti samādhipakkhikadhammānaṃ etaṃ nāmaṃ. Tenevāha – “na monamatthi asamāhitassā”ti.
atk-s0301a:161_7: Tattha monanti catumaggañāṇaṃ, tañhi munātīti monaṃ, catusaccadhamme jānātīti attho.
atk-s0301a:161_8: Maccudheyyassāti tebhūmakavaṭṭassa. Tañhi maccuno patiṭṭhānaṭṭhena maccudheyyanti
atk-s0301a:161_9: vuccati. Pāranti tasseva pāraṃ nibbānaṃ. Tareyyāti paṭivijjheyya pāpuṇeyya vā. Idaṃ
atk-s0301a:161_10: vuttaṃ hoti – eko araññe viharanto pamatto puggalo maccudheyyassa pāraṃ na tareyya
atk-s0301a:162_0: Mānaṃ pahāyāti arahattamaggena navavidhamānaṃ pajahitvā. Susamāhitattoti upacārappanāsamādhīhi
atk-s0301a:162_1: suṭṭhu samāhitatto. Sucetasoti ñāṇasampayuttatāya sundaracitto. Ñāṇavippayuttacittena
atk-s0301a:162_2: hi sucetasoti na vuccati, tasmā ñāṇasampayuttena sucetaso hutvāti attho. Sabbadhi
atk-s0301a:162_3: vippamuttoti sabbesu khandhāyatanādīsu vippamutto hutvā. Tareyyāti ettha tebhūmakavaṭṭaṃ
atk-s0301a:162_4: samatikkamanto nibbānaṃ paṭivijjhanto taratīti paṭivedhataraṇaṃ nāma vuttaṃ. Iti
atk-s0301a:162_5: imāya gāthāya tisso sikkhā kathitā honti. Kathaṃ – māno nāmāyaṃ sīlabhedano, tasmā
atk-s0301a:162_6: “mānaṃ pahāyā”ti iminā adhisīlasikkhā kathitā hoti. “Susamāhitatto”ti iminā adhicittasikkhā.
atk-s0301a:162_7: “Sucetaso”ti ettha cittena paññā dassitā, tasmā iminā adhipaññāsikkhā kathitā. Adhisīlañca
atk-s0301a:162_8: nāma sīle sati hoti, adhicittaṃ citte sati, adhipaññā paññāya sati. Tasmā sīlaṃ nāma
atk-s0301a:162_9: pañcapi dasapi sīlāni, pātimokkhasaṃvaro adhisīlaṃ nāmāti veditabbaṃ. Aṭṭha samāpattiyo
atk-s0301a:162_10: cittaṃ, vipassanāpādakajjhānaṃ adhicittaṃ. Kammassakatañāṇaṃ paññā, vipassanā adhipaññā.
atk-s0301a:162_11: Anuppannepi hi buddhuppāde pavattatīti pañcasīlaṃ dasasīlaṃ sīlameva, pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlaṃ
atk-s0301a:162_12: buddhuppādeyeva pavattatīti adhisīlaṃ. Cittapaññāsupi eseva nayo. Apica nibbānaṃ
atk-s0301a:162_13: patthayantena samādinnaṃ pañcasīlampi dasasīlampi adhisīlameva. Samāpannā aṭṭha samāpattiyopi
atk-s0301a:162_14: adhicittameva. Sabbampi vā lokiyasīlaṃ sīlameva, lokuttaraṃ adhisīlaṃ. Cittapaññāsupi
atk-s0301a:162_15: eseva nayoti. Iti imāya gāthāya samodhānetvā tisso sikkhā sakalasāsanaṃ kathitaṃ hotīti.
atk-s0301a:165_0: 10. Dasame santānanti santakilesānaṃ, paṇḍitānaṃ vā. “Santo have sabbhi pavedayanti,
atk-s0301a:165_1: dūre santo pakāsantī”tiādīsu hi paṇḍitāpi santoti vuttā. Brahmacārinanti seṭṭhacārīnaṃ
atk-s0301a:165_2: maggabrahmacariyavāsaṃ vasantānaṃ. Kena vaṇṇo pasīdatīti kena kāraṇena chavivaṇṇo
atk-s0301a:165_3: pasīdatīti pucchati. Kasmā panesā evaṃ pucchati? Esā kira vanasaṇḍavāsikā bhummadevatā
atk-s0301a:165_4: āraññake bhikkhū pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātapaṭikkante araññaṃ pavisitvā rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānesu
atk-s0301a:165_5: mūlakammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā nisinne passati. Tesañca evaṃ nisinnānaṃ balavacittekaggatā
atk-s0301a:165_6: uppajjati. Tato visabhāgasantati vūpasammati, sabhāgasantati okkamati, cittaṃ pasīdati.
atk-s0301a:165_7: Citte pasanne lohitaṃ pasīdati, cittasamuṭṭhānāni upādārūpāni parisuddhāni honti,
atk-s0301a:165_8: vaṇṭā pamuttatālaphalassa viya mukhassa vaṇṇo hoti. Taṃ disvā devatā cintesi – “sarīravaṇṇo
atk-s0301a:165_9: nāmāyaṃ paṇītāni rasasampannāni bhojanāni sukhasamphassāni nivāsanapāpuraṇasayanāni
atk-s0301a:165_10: utusukhe tebhūmikādibhede ca pāsāde mālāgandhavilepanādīni ca labhantānaṃ pasīdati,
atk-s0301a:165_11: ime pana bhikkhū piṇḍāya caritvā missakabhattaṃ bhuñjanti, viraḷamañcake vā phalake
atk-s0301a:165_12: vā silāya vā sayanāni kappenti, rukkhamūlādīsu vā abbhokāse vā vasanti, kena nu kho
atk-s0301a:165_13: kāraṇena etesaṃ vaṇṇo pasīdatī”ti. Tasmā pucchi.
atk-s0301a:166_0: Athassā bhagavā kāraṇaṃ kathento dutiyaṃ gāthaṃ āha. Tattha atītanti atīte asuko
atk-s0301a:166_1: nāma rājā dhammiko ahosi, so amhākaṃ paṇīte paccaye adāsi. Ācariyupajjhāyā lābhino
atk-s0301a:166_2: ahesuṃ. Atha mayaṃ evarūpāni bhojanāni bhuñjimhā, cīvarāni pārupimhāti evaṃ ekacce
atk-s0301a:166_3: paccayabāhullikā viya ime bhikkhū atītaṃ nānusocanti. Nappajappanti nāgatanti anāgate
atk-s0301a:166_4: dhammiko rājā bhavissati, phītā janapadā bhavissanti, bahūni sappinavanītādīni uppajjissanti,
atk-s0301a:166_5: “khādatha bhuñjathā”ti tattha tattha vattāro bhavissanti, tadā mayaṃ evarūpāni bhojanāni
atk-s0301a:166_6: bhuñjissāma, cīvarāni pārupissāmāti evaṃ anāgataṃ na patthenti. Paccuppannenāti yena
atk-s0301a:166_7: kenaci taṅkhaṇe laddhena yāpenti. Tenāti tena tividhenāpi kāraṇena.
atk-s0301a:167_0: Evaṃ vaṇṇasampattiṃ dassetvā idāni tasseva vaṇṇassa vināsaṃ dassento anantaraṃ gāthamāha.
atk-s0301a:167_1: Tattha anāgatappajappāyāti anāgatassa patthanāya. Etenāti etena kāraṇadvayena. Naḷova
atk-s0301a:167_2: harito lutoti yathā harito naḷo lāyitvā uṇhapāsāṇe pakkhitto sussati, evaṃ sussantīti.
atk-s0301a:171_0: 11. Nandanavaggassa paṭhame tatrāti tasmiṃ ārāme. Khoti byañjanasiliṭṭhatāvasena
atk-s0301a:171_1: nipātamattaṃ. Bhikkhū āmantesīti parisajeṭṭhake bhikkhū jānāpesi. Bhikkhavoti tesaṃ
atk-s0301a:171_2: āmantanākāradīpanaṃ. Bhadanteti pativacanadānaṃ. Te bhikkhūti ye tattha sammukhībhūtā
atk-s0301a:171_3: dhammapaṭiggāhakā bhikkhū. Bhagavato paccassosunti bhagavato vacanaṃ patiassosuṃ,
atk-s0301a:171_4: abhimukhā hutvā suṇiṃsu sampaṭicchiṃsūti attho. Etadavocāti etaṃ idāni vattabbaṃ
atk-s0301a:171_6: Tāvatiṃsakāyo nāma dutiyadevaloko vuccati. Maghena māṇavena saddhiṃ macalagāme kālaṃ
atk-s0301a:171_7: katvā tattha uppanne tettiṃsa devaputte upādāya kira tassa devalokassa ayaṃ paṇṇatti
atk-s0301a:171_8: jātāti vadanti. Yasmā pana sesacakkavāḷesupi cha kāmāvacaradevalokā atthi. Vuttampi
atk-s0301a:171_9: cetaṃ “sahassaṃ cātumahārājikānaṃ sahassaṃ tāvatiṃsāna”nti, tasmā nāmapaṇṇattiyevesā
atk-s0301a:171_10: tassa devalokassāti veditabbā. Evañhi niddosaṃ padaṃ hoti.
atk-s0301a:172_0: Nandane vaneti ettha taṃ vanaṃ paviṭṭhe paviṭṭhe nandayati tosetīti nandanaṃ. Pañcasu
atk-s0301a:172_1: hi maraṇanimittesu uppannesu “sampattiṃ pahāya cavissāmā”ti paridevamānā devatā sakko
atk-s0301a:172_2: devānamindo “mā paridevittha, abhijjanadhammā nāma saṅkhārā natthī”ti ovaditvā tattha
atk-s0301a:172_3: pavesāpeti. Tāsaṃ aññāhi devatāhi bāhāsu gahetvā pavesitānampi tassa sampattiṃ disvāva
atk-s0301a:172_4: maraṇasoko vūpasammati, pītipāmojjameva uppajjati. Atha tasmiṃ kīḷamānā eva uṇhasantatto
atk-s0301a:172_5: himapiṇḍo viya vilīyanti, vātāpahatadīpasikhā viya vijjhāyantīti evaṃ yaṃkiñci anto
atk-s0301a:172_6: paviṭṭhaṃ nandayati tosetiyevāti nandanaṃ, tasmiṃ nandane. Accharāsaṅghaparivutāti
atk-s0301a:172_7: accharāti devadhītānaṃ nāmaṃ, tāsaṃ samūhena parivutā.
atk-s0301a:173_1: pañcahi kāmabandhanehi kāmakoṭṭhāsehi vā. Samappitāti upetā. Itaraṃ tasseva vevacanaṃ.
atk-s0301a:173_2: Paricārayamānāti ramamānā, tesu tesu vā rūpādīsu indriyāni sañcārayamānā. Tāyaṃ velāyanti
atk-s0301a:173_3: tasmiṃ paricāraṇakāle. So panassa devaputtassa adhunā abhinibbattakālo veditabbo.
atk-s0301a:173_4: Tassa hi paṭisandhikkhaṇeyeva rattasuvaṇṇakkhandho viya virocayamāno tigāvutappamāṇo
atk-s0301a:173_5: attabhāvo nibbatti. So dibbavatthanivattho dibbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍito dibbamālāvilepanadharo
atk-s0301a:173_6: dibbehi candanacuṇṇehi samaṃ vikiriyamāno dibbehi pañcahi kāmaguṇehi ovuto nivuto
atk-s0301a:173_7: pariyonaddho lobhābhibhūto hutvā lobhanissaraṇaṃ nibbānaṃ apassanto āsabhiṃ vācaṃ
atk-s0301a:173_8: bhāsanto viya mahāsaddena “na te sukhaṃ pajānantī”ti imaṃ gāthaṃ gāyamāno nandanavane
atk-s0301a:173_9: vicari. Tena vuttaṃ – “tāyaṃ velāyaṃ imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsī”ti.
atk-s0301a:174_0: Ye na passanti nandananti ye tatra pañcakāmaguṇānubhavanavasena nandanavanaṃ na passanti.
atk-s0301a:174_1: Naradevānanti devanarānaṃ, devapurisānanti attho. Tidasānanti tikkhattuṃ dasannaṃ.
atk-s0301a:175_0: Aññatarā devatāti ekā ariyasāvikā devatā. Paccabhāsīti “ayaṃ bāladevatā imaṃ sampattiṃ
atk-s0301a:175_1: niccaṃ acalaṃ maññati, nāssā chedanabhedanaviddhaṃsanadhammataṃ jānātī”ti adhippāyaṃ
atk-s0301a:175_2: vivaṭṭetvā dassentī “na tvaṃ bāle”ti imāya gāthāya patiabhāsi. Yathā arahataṃ vacoti
atk-s0301a:175_3: yathā arahantānaṃ vacanaṃ, tathā tvaṃ na jānāsīti. Evaṃ tassā adhippāyaṃ paṭikkhipitvā
atk-s0301a:175_4: idāni arahantānaṃ vacanaṃ dassentī aniccātiādimāha. Tattha aniccā vata saṅkhārāti
atk-s0301a:175_5: sabbe tebhūmakasaṅkhārā hutvā abhāvatthena aniccā. Uppādavayadhamminoti uppādavayasabhāvā.
atk-s0301a:175_6: Uppajjitvā nirujjhantīti idaṃ purimasseva vevacanaṃ. Yasmā vā uppajjitvā nirujjhanti,
atk-s0301a:175_7: tasmā uppādavayadhamminoti. Uppādavayaggahaṇena cettha tadanantarā vemajjhaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0301a:175_8: gahitameva hoti. Tesaṃ vūpasamo sukhoti tesaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ vūpasamasaṅkhātaṃ nibbānameva
atk-s0301a:178_0: 12. Dutiye nandatīti tussati attamano hoti. Puttimāti bahuputto. Tassa hi ekacce
atk-s0301a:178_1: puttā kasikammaṃ katvā dhaññassa koṭṭhe pūrenti, ekacce vaṇijjaṃ katvā hiraññasuvaṇṇaṃ
atk-s0301a:178_2: āharanti, ekacce rājānaṃ upaṭṭhahitvā yānavāhanagāmanigamādīni labhanti. Atha tesaṃ
atk-s0301a:178_3: ānubhāvasaṅkhātaṃ siriṃ anubhavamānā mātā vā pitā vā nandati. Chaṇadivasādīsu vā
atk-s0301a:178_4: maṇḍitapasādhite putte sampattiṃ anubhavamāne disvā nandatīti, “nandati puttehi puttimā”ti
atk-s0301a:178_5: āha. Gohi tathevāti yathā puttimā puttehi, tathā gosāmikopi sampannaṃ gomaṇḍalaṃ
atk-s0301a:178_6: disvā gāvo nissāya gorasasampattiṃ anubhavamāno gohi nandati. Upadhī hi narassa nandanāti,
atk-s0301a:178_7: ettha upadhīti cattāro upadhī – kāmūpadhi, khandhūpadhi, kilesūpadhi, abhisaṅkhārūpadhīti.
atk-s0301a:178_8: Kāmāpi hi “yaṃ pañca kāmaguṇe paṭicca uppajjati sukhaṃ somanassaṃ, ayaṃ kāmānaṃ assādo”ti
atk-s0301a:178_9: evaṃ vuttassa sukhassa adhiṭṭhānabhāvato “upadhiyati ettha sukha”nti iminā vacanatthena
atk-s0301a:178_10: upadhīti vuccati. Khandhāpi khandhamūlakassa dukkhassa adhiṭṭhānabhāvato, kilesāpi
atk-s0301a:178_12: Idha pana kāmūpadhi adhippeto. Pañca hi kāmaguṇā tebhūmikādipāsāda-uḷārasayana-vatthālaṅkāra-nāṭakaparivārādivasena
atk-s0301a:178_13: paccupaṭṭhitā pītisomanassaṃ upasaṃharamānā naraṃ nandayanti. Tasmā yathā puttā ca
atk-s0301a:178_14: gāvo ca, evaṃ imepi upadhī hi narassa nandanāti veditabbā. Na hi so nandati yo nirūpadhīti
atk-s0301a:178_15: yo kāmaguṇasampattirahito daliddo dullabhaghāsacchādano, na hi so nandati. Evarūpo
atk-s0301a:178_16: manussapeto ca manussanerayiko ca kiṃ nandissati bhagavāti āha.
atk-s0301a:179_0: Idaṃ sutvā satthā cintesi – “ayaṃ devatā sokavatthumeva nandavatthuṃ karoti, sokavatthubhāvamassā
atk-s0301a:179_1: dīpessāmī”ti phalena phalaṃ pātento viya tāyeva upamāya tassā vādaṃ bhindanto tameva
atk-s0301a:179_2: gāthaṃ parivattetvā socatīti āha. Tattha socati puttehīti videsagamanādivasena puttesu
atk-s0301a:179_3: naṭṭhesupi nassantesupi idāni nassissantīti nāsasaṅkīpi socati, tathā matesupi marantesupi
atk-s0301a:179_4: corehi rājapurisehi gahitesu vā paccatthikānaṃ hatthaṃ upagatesu vā maraṇasaṅkīpi
atk-s0301a:179_5: hutvā socati. Rukkhapabbatādīhi patitvā hatthapādādīnaṃ bhedavasena bhinnesupi bhijjantesupi
atk-s0301a:179_6: bhedasaṅkīpi hutvā socati. Yathā ca puttehi puttimā, gosāmikopi tatheva navahākārehi
atk-s0301a:179_7: gohi socati. Upadhī hi narassa socanāti yathā ca puttagāvo, evaṃ pañca kāmaguṇopadhīpi –
atk-s0301a:182_0: Vuttanayena naraṃ socanti. Tasmā narassa socanā sokavatthukamevāti veditabbā. Na
atk-s0301a:182_1: hi so socati, yo nirūpadhīti yassa pana catubbidhāpete upadhiyo natthi, so nirupadhi
atk-s0301a:182_2: mahākhīṇāsavo kiṃ socissati, na socati devateti.
atk-s0301a:185_0: 13. Tatiye natthi puttasamaṃ pemanti virūpepi hi attano puttake suvaṇṇabimbakaṃ viya
atk-s0301a:185_1: maññanti, mālāguḷe viya sīsādīsu katvā pariharamānā tehi ohaditāpi omuttikāpi gandhavilepanapatitā
atk-s0301a:185_2: viya somanassaṃ āpajjanti. Tenāha – “natthi puttasamaṃ pema”nti. Puttapemasamaṃ pemaṃ
atk-s0301a:185_3: nāma natthīti vuttaṃ hoti. Gosamitaṃ dhananti gohi samaṃ godhanasamaṃ godhanasadisaṃ
atk-s0301a:185_4: aññaṃ dhanaṃ nāma natthi bhagavāti āha. Sūriyasamā ābhāti sūriyābhāya samā aññā ābhā
atk-s0301a:185_5: nāma natthīti dasseti. Samuddaparamāti ye keci aññe sarā nāma, sabbe te samuddaparamā,
atk-s0301a:185_6: samuddo tesaṃ uttamo, samuddasadisaṃ aññaṃ udakanidhānaṃ nāma natthi, bhagavāti.
atk-s0301a:186_0: Yasmā pana attapemena samaṃ pemaṃ nāma natthi. Mātāpitādayo hi chaḍḍetvāpi puttadhītādayo
atk-s0301a:186_1: ca aposetvāpi sattā attānameva posenti. Dhaññena ca samaṃ dhanaṃ nāma natthi. (Yadā
atk-s0301a:186_2: hi sattā dubbhikkhā honti), tathārūpe hi kāle hiraññasuvaṇṇādīni gomahiṃsādīnipi
atk-s0301a:186_3: dhaññaggahaṇatthaṃ dhaññasāmikānameva santikaṃ gahetvā gacchanti. Paññāya ca samā
atk-s0301a:186_4: ābhā nāma natthi. Sūriyādayo hi ekadesaṃyeva obhāsanti, paccuppannameva ca tamaṃ
atk-s0301a:186_5: vinodenti. Paññā pana dasasahassimpi lokadhātuṃ ekappajjotaṃ kātuṃ sakkoti, atītaṃsādipaṭicchādakañca
atk-s0301a:186_6: tamaṃ vidhamati. Meghavuṭṭhiyā ca samo saro nāma natthi. Nadīvāpi hotu talākādīni
atk-s0301a:186_7: vā, vuṭṭhisamo saro nāma natthi. Meghavuṭṭhiyā hi pacchinnāya mahāsamuddo aṅgulipabbatemanamattampi
atk-s0301a:186_8: udakaṃ na hoti, vuṭṭhiyā pana pavattamānāya yāva ābhassarabhavanāpi ekodakaṃ hoti.
atk-s0301a:186_9: Tasmā bhagavā devatāya paṭigāthaṃ vadanto natthi attasamaṃ pemantiādimāhāti.
atk-s0301a:189_0: 14. Catutthe khattiyo dvipadanti dvipadānaṃ rājā seṭṭho. Komārīti kumārikāle gahitā.
atk-s0301a:189_1: Ayaṃ sesabhariyānaṃ seṭṭhāti vadati. Pubbajoti paṭhamaṃ jāto kāṇo vāpi hotu kuṇiādīnaṃ
atk-s0301a:189_2: vā aññataro, yo paṭhamaṃ jāto, ayameva putto imissā devatāya vāde seṭṭho nāma hoti.
atk-s0301a:189_3: Yasmā pana dvipadādīnaṃ buddhādayo seṭṭhā, tasmā bhagavā paṭigāthaṃ āha. Tattha kiñcāpi
atk-s0301a:189_4: bhagavā sabbesaṃyeva apadādibhedānaṃ sattānaṃ seṭṭho, uppajjamāno panesa sabbasattaseṭṭho
atk-s0301a:189_5: dvipadesuyeva uppajjati, tasmā sambuddho dvipadaṃ seṭṭhoti āha. Dvipadesu uppannassa
atk-s0301a:189_6: cassa sabbasattaseṭṭhabhāvo appaṭihatova hoti. Ājānīyoti hatthī vā hotu assādīsu
atk-s0301a:189_7: aññataro vā, yo kāraṇaṃ jānāti, ayaṃ ājānīyova catuppadānaṃ seṭṭhoti attho. Kūṭakaṇṇarañño
atk-s0301a:189_8: guḷavaṇṇaasso viya. Rājā kira pācīnadvārena nikkhamitvā cetiyapabbataṃ gamissāmīti
atk-s0301a:189_9: kalambanadītīraṃ sampatto, asso tīre ṭhatvā udakaṃ otarituṃ na icchati, rājā assācariyaṃ
atk-s0301a:189_10: āmantetvā, “aho vata tayā asso sikkhāpito udakaṃ otarituṃ na icchatī”ti āha. Ācariyo
atk-s0301a:189_11: “susikkhāpito deva asso, etassa hi cittaṃ – ‘sacāhaṃ udakaṃ otarissāmi, vālaṃ temissati,
atk-s0301a:189_12: vāle tinte rañño aṅge udakaṃ pāteyyā’ti, evaṃ tumhākaṃ sarīre udakapātanabhayena
atk-s0301a:189_13: na otarati, vālaṃ gaṇhāpethā”ti āha. Rājā tathā kāresi. Asso vegena otaritvā pāraṃ
atk-s0301a:189_14: gato. Sussūsāti sussūsamānā. Kumārikāle vā gahitā hotu pacchā vā, surūpā vā virūpā
atk-s0301a:189_15: vā, yā sāmikaṃ sussūsati paricarati toseti, sā bhariyānaṃ seṭṭhā. Assavoti āsuṇamāno.
atk-s0301a:189_16: Jeṭṭho vā hi hotu kaniṭṭho vā, yo mātāpitūnaṃ vacanaṃ suṇāti, sampaṭicchati, ovādapaṭikaro
atk-s0301a:189_17: hoti, ayaṃ puttānaṃ seṭṭho, aññehi sandhicchedakādicorehi puttehi ko attho devateti.
atk-s0301a:192_0: 15. Pañcame ṭhite majjhanhiketi ṭhitamajjhanhike. Sannisīvesūti yathā phāsukaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0301a:192_1: upagantvā sannisinnesu vissamamānesu. Ṭhitamajjhanhikakālo nāmesa sabbasattānaṃ iriyāpathadubbalyakālo.
atk-s0301a:192_2: Idha pana pakkhīnaṃyeva vasena dassito. Saṇatevāti saṇati viya mahāviravaṃ viya muccati.
atk-s0301a:192_3: Saṇamānameva cettha “saṇatevā”ti vuttaṃ. Tappaṭibhāgaṃ nāmetaṃ. Nidāghasamayasmiñhi
atk-s0301a:192_4: ṭhitamajjhanhikakāle catuppadagaṇesu ceva pakkhīgaṇesu ca sannisinnesu vātapūritānaṃ
atk-s0301a:192_5: susirarukkhānañceva chiddaveṇupabbānañca khandhena khandhaṃ sākhāya sākhaṃ saṅghaṭṭayantānaṃ
atk-s0301a:192_6: pādapānañca araññamajjhe mahāsaddo uppajjati. Taṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ. Taṃ bhayaṃ
atk-s0301a:192_7: paṭibhāti manti taṃ evarūpe kāle mahāaraññassa saṇamānaṃ mayhaṃ bhayaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhāti.
atk-s0301a:192_8: Dandhapaññā kiresā devatā tasmiṃ khaṇe attano nisajjaphāsukaṃ kathāphāsukaṃ dutiyakaṃ
atk-s0301a:192_9: alabhantī evamāha. Yasmā pana tādise kāle piṇḍapātapaṭikkantassa vivitte araññāyatane
atk-s0301a:192_10: kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā nisinnassa bhikkhuno anappakaṃ sukhaṃ uppajjati, yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ –
atk-s0301a:194: Amānusī ratī hoti, sammā dhammaṃ vipassato”ti. ca,
atk-s0301a:195: “Purato pacchato vāpi, aparo ce na vijjati;
atk-s0301a:196: Atīva phāsu bhavati, ekassa vasato vane”ti. ca;
atk-s0301a:197: Tasmā bhagavā dutiyaṃ gāthamāha. Tattha sā rati paṭibhāti manti yā evarūpe kāle ekakassa nisajjā nāma, sā rati mayhaṃ upaṭṭhātīti attho. Sesaṃ tādisamevāti.
atk-s0301a:200_0: 16. Chaṭṭhe niddāti, “abhijānāmahaṃ, aggivessana, gimhānaṃ pacchime māse niddaṃ okkamitā”ti
atk-s0301a:200_2: citte uppannaṃ thinamiddhaṃ. Tandīti aticchātātisītādikālesu uppannaṃ āgantukaṃ ālasiyaṃ.
atk-s0301a:200_3: Vuttampi cetaṃ – “tattha katamā tandī? Yā tandī tandiyanā tandimanatā ālasyaṃ ālasyāyanā
atk-s0301a:200_4: ālasyāyitattaṃ, ayaṃ vuccati tandī”ti. Vijambhitāti kāyavijambhanā. Aratīti akusalapakkhā
atk-s0301a:200_5: ukkaṇṭhitatā. Bhattasammadoti bhattamucchā bhattakilamatho. Vitthāro pana tesaṃ –
atk-s0301a:200_6: “tattha katamā vijambhitā? Yā kāyassa jambhanā vijambhanā”tiādinā nayena abhidhamme
atk-s0301a:200_7: āgatova. Etenāti etena niddādinā upakkilesena upakkiliṭṭho nivāritapātubhāvo. Nappakāsatīti
atk-s0301a:200_8: na jotati, na pātubhavatīti attho. Ariyamaggoti lokuttaramaggo. Idhāti imasmiṃ loke.
atk-s0301a:200_9: Pāṇinanti sattānaṃ. Vīriyenāti maggasahajātavīriyena. Naṃ paṇāmetvāti etaṃ kilesajātaṃ
atk-s0301a:200_10: nīharitvā. Ariyamaggoti lokiyalokuttaramaggo. Iti maggeneva upakkilese nīharitvā
atk-s0301a:203_0: 17. Sattame duttitikkhanti dukkhamaṃ duadhivāsiyaṃ. Abyattenāti bālena. Sāmaññanti
atk-s0301a:203_1: samaṇadhammo. Iminā devatā idaṃ dasseti – yaṃ paṇḍitā kulaputtā dasapi vassāni vīsatipi
atk-s0301a:203_2: saṭṭhipi vassāni dante abhidantamādhāya jivhāya tāluṃ āhaccapi cetasā cittaṃ abhiniggaṇhitvāpi
atk-s0301a:203_3: ekāsanaṃ ekabhattaṃ paṭisevamānā āpāṇakoṭikaṃ brahmacariyaṃ carantā sāmaññaṃ karonti.
atk-s0301a:203_4: Taṃ bhagavā bālo abyatto kātuṃ na sakkotīti. Bahū hi tattha sambādhāti tasmiṃ sāmaññasaṅkhāte
atk-s0301a:203_5: ariyamagge bahū sambādhā maggādhigamāya paṭipannassa pubbabhāge bahū parissayāti dasseti.
atk-s0301a:204_0: Cittañce na nivārayeti yadi ayoniso uppannaṃ cittaṃ na nivāreyya, kati ahāni sāmaññaṃ
atk-s0301a:204_1: careyya? Ekadivasampi na careyya. Cittavasiko hi samaṇadhammaṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0301a:204_2: Pade padeti ārammaṇe ārammaṇe. Ārammaṇañhi idha padanti adhippetaṃ. Yasmiṃ yasmiṃ
atk-s0301a:204_3: hi ārammaṇe kileso uppajjati, tattha tattha bālo visīdati nāma. Iriyāpathapadampi
atk-s0301a:204_4: vaṭṭati. Gamanādīsu hi yattha yattha kileso uppajjati, tattha tattheva visīdati nāma.
atk-s0301a:205_0: Kummo vāti kacchapo viya. Aṅgānīti gīvapañcamāni aṅgāni. Samodahanti samodahanto,
atk-s0301a:205_1: samodahitvā vā. Manovitakketi manamhi uppannavitakke. Ettāvatā idaṃ dasseti – yathā
atk-s0301a:205_2: kummo soṇḍipañcamāni aṅgāni sake kapāle samodahanto siṅgālassa otāraṃ na deti, samodahitvā
atk-s0301a:205_3: cassa appasayhataṃ āpajjati, evamevaṃ bhikkhu manamhi uppannavitakke sake ārammaṇakapāle
atk-s0301a:205_4: samodahaṃ mārassa otāraṃ na deti, samodahitvā cassa appasayhataṃ āpajjatīti. Anissitoti
atk-s0301a:205_5: taṇhādiṭṭhinissayehi anissito hutvā. Aheṭhayānoti avihiṃsamāno. Parinibbutoti kilesanibbānena
atk-s0301a:205_6: parinibbuto. Nūpavadeyya kañcīti yaṃkiñci puggalaṃ ācāravipattiādīsu yāya kāyaci
atk-s0301a:205_7: maṅkuṃ kātukāmo hutvā na vadeyya, “kālena vakkhāmi no akālenā”tiādayo pana pañca
atk-s0301a:205_8: dhamme ajjhattaṃ upaṭṭhapetvā ullumpanasabhāvasaṇṭhitena cittena kāruññataṃ paṭicca vadeyyāti.
atk-s0301a:208_0: 18. Aṭṭhame hirīnisedhoti hiriyā akusale dhamme nisedhetīti hirīnisedho. Koci lokasmiṃ
atk-s0301a:208_1: vijjatīti koci evarūpo vijjatīti pucchati. Yo nindaṃ apabodhatīti yo garahaṃ apaharanto
atk-s0301a:208_2: bujjhati. Asso bhadro kasāmivāti yathā bhadro assājānīyo kasaṃ apaharanto bujjhati,
atk-s0301a:208_3: patodacchāyaṃ disvā saṃvijjhanto viya kasāya attani nipātaṃ na deti, evameva yo bhikkhu
atk-s0301a:208_4: bhūtassa dasaakkosavatthuno attani nipātaṃ adadanto nindaṃ apabodhati apaharanto
atk-s0301a:208_5: bujjhati, evarūpo koci khīṇāsavo vijjatīti pucchati. Abhūtakkosena pana parimutto
atk-s0301a:208_6: nāma natthi. Tanuyāti tanukā, hiriyā akusale dhamme nisedhetvā carantā khīṇāsavā
atk-s0301a:208_7: nāma appakāti attho. Sadā satāti niccakālaṃ sativepullena samannāgatā. Antaṃ dukkhassa
atk-s0301a:208_8: pappuyyāti vaṭṭadukkhassa koṭiṃ antabhūtaṃ nibbānaṃ pāpuṇitvā. Sesaṃ vuttanayamevāti.
atk-s0301a:211_0: 19. Navame kacci te kuṭikāti ayaṃ devatā dasa māse antovasanaṭṭhānaṭṭhena mātaraṃ
atk-s0301a:211_1: kuṭikaṃ katvā, yathā sakuṇā divasaṃ gocarapasutā rattiṃ kulāvakaṃ allīyanti, evamevaṃ
atk-s0301a:211_2: sattā tattha tattha gantvāpi mātugāmassa santikaṃ āgacchanti, ālayavasena bhariyaṃ
atk-s0301a:211_3: kulāvakaṃ katvā. Kulapaveṇiṃ santānakaṭṭhena putte santānake katvā, taṇhaṃ bandhanaṃ
atk-s0301a:211_4: katvā, gāthābandhanena ime pañhe samodhānetvā bhagavantaṃ pucchi, bhagavāpissā vissajjento
atk-s0301a:211_5: tagghātiādimāha. Tattha tagghāti ekaṃsavacane nipāto. Natthīti pahāya pabbajitattā
atk-s0301a:211_6: vaṭṭasmiṃ vā puna mātukucchivāsassa dārabharaṇassa puttanibbattiyā vā abhāvato natthi.
atk-s0301a:212_0: Devatā “mayā sannāhaṃ bandhitvā guḷhā pañhā pucchitā, ayañca samaṇo pucchitamatteyeva
atk-s0301a:212_1: vissajjesi, jānaṃ nu kho me ajjhāsayaṃ kathesi, udāhu ajānaṃ yaṃ vā taṃ vā mukhāruḷhaṃ
atk-s0301a:212_2: kathesī”ti cintetvā puna kintāhantiādimāha. Tattha kintāhanti kiṃ te ahaṃ. Athassā
atk-s0301a:212_3: bhagavā ācikkhanto mātarantiādimāha. Sāhu teti gāthāya anumoditvā sampahaṃsitvā bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0301a:212_4: vanditvā gandhamālādīhi pūjetvā attano devaṭṭhānameva gatāti.
atk-s0301a:215_0: 20. Dasame tapodārāmeti tapodassa tattodakassa rahadassa vasena evaṃ laddhanāme ārāme.
atk-s0301a:215_1: Vebhārapabbatassa kira heṭṭhā bhummaṭṭhakanāgānaṃ pañcayojanasatikaṃ nāgabhavanaṃ
atk-s0301a:215_2: devalokasadisaṃ maṇimayena talena ārāmuyyānehi ca samannāgataṃ. Tattha nāgānaṃ kīḷanaṭṭhāne
atk-s0301a:215_3: mahāudakarahado, tato tapodā nāma nadī sandati kuthitā uṇhodakā. Kasmā panesā edisā?
atk-s0301a:215_4: Rājagahaṃ kira parivāretvā mahāpetaloko tiṭṭhati, tattha dvinnaṃ mahālohakumbhinirayānaṃ
atk-s0301a:215_5: antarena ayaṃ tapodā āgacchati, tasmā kuthitā sandati. Vuttampi cetaṃ –
atk-s0301a:216_0: “Yatāyaṃ, bhikkhave, tapodā sandati, so daho acchodako sītodako sātodako setodako
atk-s0301a:216_1: suppatittho ramaṇīyo pahūtamacchakacchapo, cakkamattāni ca padumāni pupphanti. Apicāyaṃ,
atk-s0301a:216_2: bhikkhave, tapodā dvinnaṃ mahānirayānaṃ antarikāya āgacchati, tenāyaṃ tapodā kuthitā sandatī”ti.
atk-s0301a:217: Imassa pana ārāmassa abhimukhaṭṭhāne tato mahāudakarahado jāto, tassa vasenāyaṃ vihāro “tapodārāmo”ti vuccati.
atk-s0301a:218_0: Samiddhīti tassa kira therassa attabhāvo samiddho abhirūpo pāsādiko, tasmā “samiddhī”tveva
atk-s0301a:218_1: saṅkhaṃ gato. Gattāni parisiñcitunti padhānikatthero esa, balavapaccūse uṭṭhāyāsanā
atk-s0301a:218_2: sarīraṃ utuṃ gāhāpetvā bahi saṭṭhihatthamatte mahācaṅkame aparāparaṃ caṅkamitvā “sedagahitehi
atk-s0301a:218_3: gattehi paribhuñjamānaṃ senāsanaṃ kilissatī”ti maññamāno gattāni parisiñcanatthaṃ
atk-s0301a:218_4: sarīradhovanatthaṃ upasaṅkami. Ekacīvaro aṭṭhāsīti nivāsanaṃ nivāsetvā kāyabandhanaṃ
atk-s0301a:219_0: Gattāni pubbāpayamānoti gattāni pubbasadisāni vodakāni kurumāno. Allasarīre pārutaṃ
atk-s0301a:219_1: hi cīvaraṃ kilissati duggandhaṃ hoti, na cetaṃ vattaṃ. Thero pana vattasampanno,
atk-s0301a:219_2: tasmā vatte ṭhitova nhāyitvā paccuttaritvā aṭṭhāsi. Tattha idaṃ nhānavattaṃ – udakatitthaṃ
atk-s0301a:219_3: gantvā yattha katthaci cīvarāni nikkhipitvā vegena ṭhitakeneva na otaritabbaṃ, sabbadisā
atk-s0301a:219_4: pana oloketvā vivittabhāvaṃ ñatvā khāṇugumbalatādīni vavatthapetvā tikkhattuṃ ukkāsitvā
atk-s0301a:219_5: avakujja ṭhitena uttarāsaṅgacīvaraṃ apanetvā pasāretabbaṃ, kāyabandhanaṃ mocetvā
atk-s0301a:219_6: cīvarapiṭṭheyeva ṭhapetabbaṃ. Sace udakasāṭikā natthi, udakante ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā
atk-s0301a:219_7: nivāsanaṃ mocetvā sace sinnaṭṭhānaṃ atthi, pasāretabbaṃ. No ce atthi, saṃharitvā
atk-s0301a:219_8: ṭhapetabbaṃ. Udakaṃ otarantena saṇikaṃ nābhippamāṇamattaṃ otaritvā vīciṃ anuṭṭhāpentena
atk-s0301a:219_9: saddaṃ akarontena nivattitvā āgatadisābhimukhena nimujjitabbaṃ, evaṃ cīvaraṃ rakkhitaṃ
atk-s0301a:219_10: hoti. Ummujjantenapi saddaṃ akarontena saṇikaṃ ummujjitvā nhānapariyosāne udakante
atk-s0301a:219_11: ukkuṭikena nisīditvā nivāsanaṃ parikkhipitvā uṭṭhāya suparimaṇḍalaṃ nivāsetvā kāyabandhanaṃ
atk-s0301a:220_0: Theropi tathā nhāyitvā paccuttaritvā vigacchamānaudakaṃ kāyaṃ olokayamāno aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0301a:220_1: Tassa pakatiyāpi pāsādikassa paccūsasamaye sammā pariṇatāhārassa uṇhodakena nhātassa
atk-s0301a:220_2: ativiya mukhavaṇṇo viroci, bandhanā pavuttatālaphalaṃ viya pabhāsampanno puṇṇacando
atk-s0301a:220_3: viya taṅkhaṇavikasitapadumaṃ viya mukhaṃ sassirikaṃ ahosi, sarīravaṇṇopi vippasīdi.
atk-s0301a:220_4: Tasmiṃ samaye vanasaṇḍe adhivatthā bhummadevatā pāsādikaṃ bhikkhuṃ olokayamānā samanaṃ
atk-s0301a:220_5: niggahetuṃ asakkontī kāmapariḷāhābhibhūtā hutvā, “theraṃ palobhessāmī”ti attabhāvaṃ
atk-s0301a:220_6: uḷārena alaṅkārena alaṅkaritvā sahassavaṭṭipadīpaṃ pajjalamānā viya candaṃ uṭṭhāpayamānā
atk-s0301a:220_7: viya sakalārāmaṃ ekobhāsaṃ katvā theraṃ upasaṅkamitvā avanditvāva vehāse ṭhitā gāthaṃ
atk-s0301a:220_8: abhāsi. Tena vuttaṃ – “atha kho aññatarā devatā…pe… ajjhabhāsī”ti.
atk-s0301a:221_0: Abhutvāti pañca kāmaguṇe aparibhuñjitvā. Bhikkhasīti piṇḍāya carasi. Mā taṃ kālo
atk-s0301a:221_1: upaccagāti ettha kālo nāma pañcakāmaguṇapaṭisevanakkhamo daharayobbanakālo. Jarājiṇṇena
atk-s0301a:221_2: hi obhaggena daṇḍaparāyaṇena pavedhamānena kāsasāsābhibhūtena na sakkā kāme paribhuñjituṃ.
atk-s0301a:221_3: Iti imaṃ kālaṃ sandhāya devatā “mā taṃ kālo upaccagā”ti āha. Tattha mā upaccagāti mā atikkami.
atk-s0301a:222: Kālaṃ vohaṃ na jānāmīti ettha voti nipātamattaṃ. Kālaṃ na jānāmīti maraṇakālaṃ sandhāya vadati. Sattānañhi –
atk-s0301a:225_0: Tattha jīvitaṃ tāva “ettakameva, na ito para”nti vavatthānābhāvato animittaṃ. Kalalakālepi
atk-s0301a:225_2: dasamāsakālepi, kucchito nikkhantasamayepi, tato paraṃ vassasatassa antopi bahipi
atk-s0301a:225_3: marantiyeva. Byādhipi “imināva byādhinā sattā maranti, na aññenā”ti vavatthānābhāvato
atk-s0301a:225_4: animitto. Cakkhurogenapi hi sattā maranti sotarogādīnaṃ aññatarenapi. Kālopi, “imasmiṃ
atk-s0301a:225_5: yeva kāle maritabbaṃ, na aññasmi”nti evaṃ vavatthānābhāvato animitto. Pubbaṇhepi
atk-s0301a:225_6: hi sattā maranti majjhanhikādīnaṃ aññatarasmimpi. Dehanikkhepanampi, “idheva mīyamānānaṃ
atk-s0301a:225_7: dehena patitabbaṃ, na aññatthā”ti evaṃ vavatthānābhāvato animittaṃ. Antogāme jātānañhi
atk-s0301a:225_8: bahigāmepi attabhāvo patati, bahigāmepi jātānaṃ antogāmepi. Tathā thalajānaṃ jale,
atk-s0301a:225_9: jalajānaṃ thaleti anekappakārato vitthāretabbaṃ. Gatipi, “ito cutena idha nibbattitabba”nti
atk-s0301a:225_10: evaṃ vavatthānābhāvato animittā. Devalokato hi cutā manussesupi nibbattanti, manussalokato
atk-s0301a:225_11: cutā devalokādīnaṃ yattha katthaci nibbattantīti evaṃ yante yuttagoṇo viya gatipañcake
atk-s0301a:225_12: loko samparivattati. Tassevaṃ samparivattato “imasmiṃ nāma kāle maraṇaṃ bhavissatī”ti
atk-s0301a:225_13: imaṃ maraṇassa kālaṃ vohaṃ na jānāmi.
atk-s0301a:226_0: Channo kālo na dissatīti ayaṃ kālo mayhaṃ paṭicchanno avibhūto na paññāyati. Tasmāti
atk-s0301a:226_1: yasmā ayaṃ kālo paṭicchanno na paññāyati, tasmā pañca kāmaguṇe abhutvāva bhikkhāmi.
atk-s0301a:226_2: Mā maṃ kālo upaccagāti ettha samaṇadhammakaraṇakālaṃ sandhāya “kālo”ti āha. Ayañhi
atk-s0301a:226_3: samaṇadhammo nāma pacchime kāle tisso vayosīmā atikkantena obhaggena daṇḍaparāyaṇena
atk-s0301a:226_4: pavedhamānena kāsasāsābhibhūtena na sakkā kātuṃ. Tadā hi na sakkā hoti icchiticchitaṃ
atk-s0301a:226_5: buddhavacanaṃ vā gaṇhituṃ, dhutaṅgaṃ vā paribhuñjituṃ, araññavāsaṃ vā vasituṃ, icchiticchitakkhaṇe
atk-s0301a:226_7: taruṇayobbanakāle panetaṃ sabbaṃ sakkā kātunti ayaṃ samaṇadhammakaraṇassa kālo mā
atk-s0301a:226_8: maṃ upaccagā, yāva maṃ nātikkamati, tāva kāme abhutvāva samaṇadhammaṃ karomīti āha.
atk-s0301a:227_0: Pathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhahitvāti sā kira devatā – “ayaṃ bhikkhu samaṇadhammakaraṇassa kālaṃ
atk-s0301a:227_1: nāma katheti, akālaṃ nāma katheti, sahetukaṃ katheti sānisaṃsa”nti ettāvatāva there
atk-s0301a:227_2: lajjaṃ paccupaṭṭhāpetvā mahābrahmaṃ viya aggikkhandhaṃ viya ca naṃ maññamānā gāravajātā
atk-s0301a:227_3: ākāsā oruyha pathaviyaṃ aṭṭhāsi, taṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ. Kiñcāpi pathaviyaṃ ṭhitā,
atk-s0301a:227_4: yena panatthena āgatā, punapi tameva gahetvā daharo tvantiādimāha. Tattha susūti
atk-s0301a:227_5: taruṇo. Kāḷakesoti suṭṭhu kāḷakeso. Bhadrenāti bhaddakena. Ekacco hi daharopi samāno
atk-s0301a:227_6: kāṇo vā hoti kuṇiādīnaṃ vā aññataro, so bhadrena yobbanena samannāgato nāma na hoti.
atk-s0301a:227_7: Yo pana abhirūpo hoti dassanīyo pāsādiko sabbasampattisampanno, yaṃ yadeva alaṅkāraparihāraṃ
atk-s0301a:227_8: icchati, tena tena alaṅkato devaputto viya carati, ayaṃ bhadrena yobbanena samannāgato
atk-s0301a:227_9: nāma hoti. Thero ca uttamarūpasampanno, tena naṃ evamāha.
atk-s0301a:228_0: Anikkīḷitāvī kāmesūti kāmesu akīḷitakīḷo abhuttāvī, akatakāmakīḷoti attho. Mā sandiṭṭhikaṃ
atk-s0301a:228_1: hitvāti yebhuyyena hi tā adiṭṭhasaccā avītarāgā aparacittavidūniyo devatā bhikkhū
atk-s0301a:228_2: dasapi vassāni vīsatimpi…pe… saṭṭhimpi vassāni parisuddhaṃ akhaṇḍaṃ brahmacariyaṃ
atk-s0301a:228_3: caramāne disvā – “ime bhikkhū mānusake pañca kāmaguṇe pahāya dibbe kāme patthayantā
atk-s0301a:228_4: samaṇadhammaṃ karontī”ti saññaṃ uppādenti, ayampi tattheva uppādesi. Tasmā mānusake
atk-s0301a:228_5: kāme sandiṭṭhike, dibbe ca kālike katvā evamāha.
atk-s0301a:229_0: Na kho ahaṃ, āvusoti, āvuso, ahaṃ sandiṭṭhike kāme hitvā kālike kāme na anudhāvāmi
atk-s0301a:229_1: na patthemi na pihemi. Kalikañca kho ahaṃ, āvusoti ahaṃ kho, āvuso, kālikaṃ kāmaṃ
atk-s0301a:229_2: hitvā sandiṭṭhikaṃ lokuttaradhammaṃ anudhāvāmi. Iti thero cittānantaraṃ aladdhabbatāya
atk-s0301a:229_3: dibbepi mānusakepi pañca kāmaguṇe kālikāti akāsi, cittānantaraṃ laddhabbatāya lokuttaradhammaṃ
atk-s0301a:229_4: sandiṭṭhikanti. Pañcakāmaguṇesu samohitesupi sampannakāmassāpi kāmino cittānantaraṃ
atk-s0301a:229_5: icchiticchitārammaṇānubhavanaṃ na sampajjati. Cakkhudvāre iṭṭhārammaṇaṃ anubhavitukāmena
atk-s0301a:229_6: hi cittakārapotthakārarūpakārādayo pakkosāpetvā, “idaṃ nāma sajjethā”ti vattabbaṃ
atk-s0301a:229_7: hoti. Etthantare anekakoṭisatasahassāni cittāni uppajjitvā nirujjhanti. Atha pacchā
atk-s0301a:229_8: taṃ ārammaṇaṃ sampāpuṇāti. Sesadvāresupi eseva nayo. Sotāpattimaggānantaraṃ pana
atk-s0301a:229_9: sotāpattiphalameva uppajjati, antarā aññassa cittassa vāro natthi. Sesaphalesupi eseva nayoti.
atk-s0301a:230_0: So tamevatthaṃ gahetvā kālikā hi, āvusotiādimāha. Tattha kālikāti vuttanayena samohitasampattināpi
atk-s0301a:230_1: kālantare pattabbā. Bahudukkhāti pañca kāmaguṇe nissāya pattabbadukkhassa bahutāya
atk-s0301a:230_2: bahudukkhā. Taṃvatthukasseva upāyāsassa bahutāya bahupāyāsā. Ādīnavo ettha bhiyyoti
atk-s0301a:230_3: pañca kāmaguṇe nissāya laddhabbasukhato ādīnavo bhiyyo, dukkhameva bahutaranti attho.
atk-s0301a:230_4: Sandiṭṭhiko ayaṃ dhammoti ayaṃ lokuttaradhammo yena yena adhigato hoti, tena tena
atk-s0301a:230_5: parasaddhāya gantabbataṃ hitvā paccavekkhaṇañāṇena sayaṃ daṭṭhabboti sandiṭṭhiko.
atk-s0301a:230_6: Attano phaladānaṃ sandhāya nāssa kāloti akālo, akāloyeva akāliko. Yo ettha ariyamaggadhammo,
atk-s0301a:230_7: so attano pavattisamanantarameva phalaṃ detīti attho. “Ehi passa imaṃ dhamma”nti
atk-s0301a:230_8: evaṃ pavattaṃ ehipassavidhiṃ arahatīti ehipassiko. Ādittaṃ celaṃ vā sīsaṃ vā ajjhupekkhitvāpi
atk-s0301a:230_9: bhāvanāvasena attano citte upanayaṃ arahatīti opaneyyiko. Sabbehi ugghaṭitaññūādīhi
atk-s0301a:230_10: viññūhi “bhāvito me maggo, adhigataṃ phalaṃ, sacchikato nirodho”ti attani attani
atk-s0301a:230_11: veditabboti paccattaṃ veditabbo viññūhīti. Ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthāro pana visuddhimagge
atk-s0301a:231_0: Idāni sā devatā andho viya rūpavisesaṃ therena kathitassa atthe ajānantī kathañca
atk-s0301a:231_1: bhikkhūtiādimāha. Tattha kathañcātipadassa “kathañca bhikkhu kālikā kāmā vuttā bhagavatā,
atk-s0301a:231_2: kathaṃ bahudukkhā, kathaṃ bahupāyāsā”ti? Evaṃ sabbapadehi sambandho veditabbo.
atk-s0301a:232_0: Navoti aparipuṇṇapañcavasso hi bhikkhu navo nāma hoti, pañcavassato paṭṭhāya majjhimo,
atk-s0301a:232_1: dasavassato paṭṭhāya thero. Aparo nayo – aparipuṇṇadasavasso navo, dasavassato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0301a:232_2: majjhimo, vīsativassato paṭṭhāya thero. Tesaṃ ahaṃ navoti vadati.
atk-s0301a:233_0: Navopi ekacco sattaṭṭhavassakāle pabbajitvā dvādasaterasavassāni sāmaṇerabhāveneva
atk-s0301a:233_1: atikkanto cirapabbajito hoti, ahaṃ pana acirapabbajitoti vadati. Imaṃ dhammavinayanti
atk-s0301a:233_2: imaṃ dhammañca vinayañca. Ubhayampetaṃ sāsanasseva nāmaṃ. Dhammena hettha dve piṭakāni
atk-s0301a:233_3: vuttāni, vinayena vinayapiṭakaṃ, iti tīhi piṭakehi pakāsitaṃ paṭipattiṃ adhunā āgatomhīti vadati.
atk-s0301a:234_0: Mahesakkhāhīti mahāparivārāhi. Ekekassa hi devarañño koṭisatampi koṭisahassampi parivāro
atk-s0301a:234_1: hoti, te attānaṃ mahante ṭhāne ṭhapetvā tathāgataṃ passanti. Tattha amhādisānaṃ appesakkhānaṃ
atk-s0301a:235_0: Mayampi āgaccheyyāmāti idaṃ sā devatā “sacepi cakkavāḷaṃ pūretvā parisā nisinnā hoti,
atk-s0301a:235_1: mahatiyā buddhavīthiyā satthu santikaṃ gantuṃ labhatī”ti ñatvā āha. Puccha bhikkhu,
atk-s0301a:236_0: Akkheyyasaññinoti ettha “devo, manusso, gahaṭṭho, pabbajito, satto, puggalo, tisso,
atk-s0301a:236_1: phusso”tiādinā nayena akkheyyato sabbesaṃ akkhānānaṃ sabbāsaṃ kathānaṃ vatthubhūtato
atk-s0301a:236_2: pañcakkhandhā “akkheyyā”ti vuccanti. “Satto naro poso puggalo itthī puriso”ti evaṃ
atk-s0301a:236_3: saññā etesaṃ atthīti saññino, akkheyyesveva saññinoti akkheyyasaññino, pañcasu khandhesu
atk-s0301a:236_4: sattapuggalādisaññinoti attho. Akkheyyasmiṃ patiṭṭhitāti pañcasu khandhesu aṭṭhahākārehi
atk-s0301a:236_5: patiṭṭhitā. Ratto hi rāgavasena patiṭṭhito hoti, duṭṭho dosavasena, mūḷho mohavasena,
atk-s0301a:236_6: parāmaṭṭho diṭṭhivasena, thāmagato anusayavasena, vinibaddho mānavasena, aniṭṭhaṅgato
atk-s0301a:236_7: vicikicchāvasena, vikkhepagato uddhaccavasena patiṭṭhito hoti. Akkheyyaṃ apariññāyāti
atk-s0301a:236_8: pañcakkhandhe tīhi pariññāhi aparijānitvā. Yogamāyanti maccunoti maccuno yogaṃ payogaṃ
atk-s0301a:236_9: pakkhepaṃ upakkhepaṃ upakkamaṃ abbhantaraṃ āgacchanti, maraṇavasaṃ gacchantīti attho.
atk-s0301a:237_0: Pariññāyāti ñātapariññā, tīraṇapariññā, pahānapariññāti imāhi tīhi pariññāhi parijānitvā.
atk-s0301a:237_1: Tattha katamā ñātapariññā? Pañcakkhandhe parijānāti – “ayaṃ rūpakkhandho, ayaṃ vedanākkhandho,
atk-s0301a:237_2: ayaṃ saññākkhandho, ayaṃ saṅkhārakkhandho, ayaṃ viññāṇakkhandho, imāni tesaṃ lakkhaṇarasapaccupaṭṭhānapadaṭṭhānānī”ti,
atk-s0301a:237_3: ayaṃ ñātapariññā. Katamā tīraṇapariññā? Evaṃ ñātaṃ katvā pañcakkhandhe tīreti aniccato
atk-s0301a:237_4: dukkhato rogatoti dvācattālīsāya ākārehi. Ayaṃ tīraṇapariññā. Katamā pahānapariññā?
atk-s0301a:237_5: Evaṃ tīrayitvā aggamaggena pañcasu khandhesu chandarāgaṃ pajahati. Ayaṃ pahānapariññā.
atk-s0301a:238_0: Akkhātāraṃ na maññatīti evaṃ tīhi pariññāhi pañcakkhandhe parijānitvā khīṇāsavo bhikkhu
atk-s0301a:238_1: akkhātāraṃ puggalaṃ na maññati. Akkhātāranti kammavasena kāraṇaṃ veditabbaṃ, akkhātabbaṃ
atk-s0301a:238_2: kathetabbaṃ puggalaṃ na maññati, na passatīti attho. Kinti akkhātabbanti? “Tisso”ti
atk-s0301a:238_3: vā “phusso”ti vā evaṃ yena kenaci nāmena vā gottena vā pakāsetabbaṃ. Tañhi tassa
atk-s0301a:238_4: na hotīti taṃ tassa khīṇāsavassa na hoti. Yena naṃ vajjāti yena naṃ “rāgena ratto”ti
atk-s0301a:238_5: vā “dosena duṭṭho”ti vā “mohena mūḷho”ti vāti koci vadeyya, taṃ kāraṇaṃ tassa khīṇāsavassa natthi.
atk-s0301a:239_0: Sace vijānāsi vadehīti sace evarūpaṃ khīṇāsavaṃ jānāsi, “jānāmī”ti vadehi. No ce
atk-s0301a:239_1: jānāsi, atha “na jānāmī”ti vadehi. Yakkhāti devataṃ ālapanto āha. Iti imāya gāthāya
atk-s0301a:239_2: sandiṭṭhiko navavidho lokuttaradhammo kathito. Sādhūti āyācanatthe nipāto.
atk-s0301a:240_0: Yo maññatīti yo attānaṃ “ahaṃ samo”ti vā “visesī”ti vā “nihīno”ti vā maññati. Etena
atk-s0301a:240_1: “seyyohamasmī”tiādayo tayo mānā gahitāva. Tesu gahitesu nava mānā gahitāva honti.
atk-s0301a:240_2: So vivadetha tenāti so puggalo teneva mānena yena kenaci puggalena saddhiṃ – “kena
atk-s0301a:240_3: maṃ tvaṃ pāpuṇāsi, kiṃ jātiyā pāpuṇāsi, udāhu gottena, kulapadesena, vaṇṇapokkharatāya,
atk-s0301a:240_4: bāhusaccena, dhutaguṇenā”ti evaṃ vivadeyya. Iti imāyapi upaḍḍhagāthāya kālikā kāmā kathitā.
atk-s0301a:241_0: Tīsu vidhāsūti tīsu mānesu. “Ekavidhena rūpasaṅgaho”tiādīsu hi koṭṭhāso “vidho”ti
atk-s0301a:241_1: vutto. “Kathaṃvidhaṃ sīlavantaṃ vadanti, kathaṃvidhaṃ paññavantaṃ vadantī”tiādīsu
atk-s0301a:241_2: ākāro. “Tisso imā, bhikkhave, vidhā. Katamā tisso? Seyyohamasmīti vidhā, sadisohamasmīti
atk-s0301a:241_3: vidhā, hīnohamasmīti vidhā”tiādīsu māno “vidhā”ti vutto. Idhāpi mānova. Tena vuttaṃ
atk-s0301a:241_4: “tīsu vidhāsūti tīsu mānesū”ti. Avikampamānoti so puggalo etesu saṅkhepato tīsu,
atk-s0301a:241_5: vitthārato navasu mānesu na kampati, na calati. Samo visesīti na tassa hotīti tassa
atk-s0301a:241_6: pahīnamānassa khīṇāsavassa “ahaṃ sadiso”ti vā “seyyo”ti vā “hīno”ti vā na hotīti
atk-s0301a:241_7: dasseti. Pacchimapadaṃ vuttanayameva. Iti imāyapi upaḍḍhagāthāya navavidho sandiṭṭhiko
atk-s0301a:242_0: Pahāsi saṅkhanti, “paṭisaṅkhā yoniso āhāraṃ āhāretī”tiādīsu paññā “saṅkhā”ti āgatā.
atk-s0301a:242_1: “Atthi te koci gaṇako vā muddiko vā saṅkhāyako vā, yo pahoti gaṅgāya vālukaṃ gaṇetu”nti
atk-s0301a:242_2: ettha gaṇanā. “Saññānidānā hi papañcasaṅkhā”tiādīsu koṭṭhāso. “Yā tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ
atk-s0301a:242_3: saṅkhā samaññā”ti ettha paṇṇatti “saṅkhā”ti āgatā. Idhāpi ayameva adhippetā. Pahāsi
atk-s0301a:242_4: saṅkhanti padassa hi ayamevattho – ratto duṭṭho mūḷho iti imaṃ paṇṇattiṃ khīṇāsavo
atk-s0301a:243_0: Na vimānamajjhagāti navabhedaṃ tividhamānaṃ na upagato. Nivāsaṭṭhena vā mātukucchi
atk-s0301a:243_1: “vimāna”nti vuccati, taṃ āyatiṃ paṭisandhivasena na upagacchītipi attho. Anāgatatthe
atk-s0301a:243_2: atītavacanaṃ. Acchecchīti chindi. Chinnaganthanti cattāro ganthe chinditvā ṭhitaṃ.
atk-s0301a:243_3: Anīghanti niddukkhaṃ. Nirāsanti nittaṇhaṃ. Pariyesamānāti olokayamānā. Nājjhagamunti
atk-s0301a:243_4: na adhigacchanti na vindanti na passanti. Vattamānatthe atītavacanaṃ. Idha vā huraṃ
atk-s0301a:243_5: vāti idhaloke vā paraloke vā. Sabbanivesanesūti tayo bhavā, catasso yoniyo, pañca
atk-s0301a:243_6: gatiyo, satta viññāṇaṭṭhitiyo, nava sattāvāsā, iti imesupi sabbesu sattanivesanesu
atk-s0301a:243_7: evarūpaṃ khīṇāsavaṃ kāyassa bhedā uppajjamānaṃ vā uppannaṃ vā na passantīti attho.
atk-s0301a:244_0: Imañca gāthaṃ sutvā sāpi devatā atthaṃ sallakkhesi, teneva kāraṇena imassa khvāhaṃ,
atk-s0301a:244_1: bhantetiādimāha. Tattha pāpaṃ na kayirāti gāthāya dasakusalakammapathavasenapi kathetuṃ
atk-s0301a:244_2: vaṭṭati aṭṭhaṅgikamaggavasenapi. Dasakusalakammapathavasena tāva vacasāti catubbidhaṃ
atk-s0301a:244_3: vacīsucaritaṃ gahitaṃ. Manasāti tividhaṃ manosucaritaṃ gahitaṃ. Kāyena vā kiñcana
atk-s0301a:244_4: sabbaloketi tividhaṃ kāyasucaritaṃ gahitaṃ. Ime tāva dasakusalakammapathadhammā honti.
atk-s0301a:244_5: Kāme pahāyāti iminā pana kāmasukhallikānuyogo paṭikkhitto. Satimā sampajānoti iminā
atk-s0301a:244_6: dasakusalakammapathakāraṇaṃ satisampajaññaṃ gahitaṃ. Dukkhaṃ na sevetha anatthasaṃhitanti
atk-s0301a:244_7: iminā attakilamathānuyogo paṭisiddho. Iti devatā “ubho ante vivajjetvā kāraṇehi satisampajaññehi
atk-s0301a:244_8: saddhiṃ dasakusalakammapathadhamme tumhehi kathite ājānāmi bhagavā”ti vadati.
atk-s0301a:245_0: Aṭṭhaṅgikamaggavasena pana ayaṃ nayo – tasmiṃ kira ṭhāne mahatī dhammadesanā ahosi.
atk-s0301a:245_1: Desanāpariyosāne devatā yathāṭhāne ṭhitāva desanānusārena ñāṇaṃ pesetvā sotāpattiphale
atk-s0301a:245_2: patiṭṭhāya attanā adhigataṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ dassentī evamāha. Tattha vacasāti
atk-s0301a:245_3: sammāvācā gahitā, mano pana aṅgaṃ na hotīti manasāti maggasampayuttakaṃ cittaṃ gahitaṃ.
atk-s0301a:245_4: Kāyena vā kiñcana sabbaloketi sammākammanto gahito, ājīvo pana vācākammantapakkhikattā
