atk-s0301a:1378_1: pañhe saha vissajjanena uggahesuṃ. Te daharakāle āḷavakaṃ pariyāpuṇāpesuṃ; so kālaccayena
atk-s0301a:1378_2: vissajjanaṃ sammussi. Tato “ime pañhāpi mā vinassantū”ti suvaṇṇapaṭṭhe jātihiṅgulakena
atk-s0301a:1378_3: lekhāpetvā vimāne nikkhipi. Evamete puṭṭhapañhā buddhavisayāva honti. Bhagavā taṃ
atk-s0301a:1378_4: sutvā yasmā buddhānaṃ pariccattalābhantarāyo vā jīvitantarāyo vā sabbaññutaññāṇabyāmappabhādipaṭighāto
atk-s0301a:1378_5: vā na sakkā kenaci kātuṃ, tasmā naṃ loke asādhāraṇaṃ buddhānubhāvaṃ dassento na khvāhaṃ
atk-s0301a:1379_0: Evaṃ bhagavā tassa bādhanacittaṃ paṭisedhetvā pañhāpucchane ussāhaṃ janento āha apica
atk-s0301a:1379_1: tvaṃ, āvuso, puccha, yadākaṅkhasīti. Tassattho – puccha, yadi ākāṅkhasi, na me pañhāvissajjane
atk-s0301a:1379_2: bhāro atthi. Atha vā puccha, yaṃ ākaṅkhasi. Sabbaṃ te vissajjessāmīti sabbaññupavāraṇaṃ
atk-s0301a:1379_3: pavāresi asādhāraṇaṃ paccekabuddhaaggasāvakamahāsāvakehi. Evaṃ bhagavato sabbaññupavāraṇāya
atk-s0301a:1379_4: pavāritāya atha kho āḷavako yakkho bhagavantaṃ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi.
atk-s0301a:1380_0: Tattha kiṃ sūdha vittanti, kiṃ su idha vittaṃ. Vittanti dhanaṃ. Taṃ hi pītisaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0301a:1380_1: vittiṃ karoti, tasmā “vitta”nti vuccati. Suciṇṇanti sukataṃ. Sukhanti kāyikacetasikaṃ
atk-s0301a:1380_2: sātaṃ. Āvahātīti āvahati āneti deti appeti. Have-iti daḷhatthe nipāto. Sādutaranti
atk-s0301a:1380_3: atisayena sādu. “Sādhutara”ntipi pāṭho. Rasānanti rasasaññitānaṃ dhammānaṃ. Kathanti
atk-s0301a:1380_4: kena pakārena. Kathaṃjīvino jīvitaṃ kathaṃjīviṃjīvitaṃ. Gāthābandhasukhatthaṃ pana
atk-s0301a:1380_5: sānunāsikaṃ vuccati. Kathaṃjīviṃ jīvatanti vā pāṭho, tassa “jīvantānaṃ kathaṃjīvi”nti
atk-s0301a:1380_6: attho. Evaṃ imāya gāthāya “kiṃ su idha loke purisassa vittaṃ seṭṭhaṃ? Kiṃ su suciṇṇaṃ
atk-s0301a:1380_7: sukhamāvahāti? Kiṃ rasānaṃ sādutaraṃ? Kathaṃjīviṃ jīvitaṃ seṭṭhamāhū”ti? Ime cattāro pañhe pucchi.
atk-s0301a:1381_0: Athassa bhagavā kassapadasabalena vissajjitanayeneva vissajjento imaṃ gāthamāha saddhīdha
atk-s0301a:1381_1: vittanti. Tattha yathā hiraññasuvaṇṇādi vittaṃ upabhogasukhaṃ āvahati, khuppipāsādidukkhaṃ
atk-s0301a:1381_2: paṭibāhati, dāliddiyaṃ vūpasameti, muttādiratanapaṭilābhahetu hoti, lokasantatiñca
atk-s0301a:1381_3: āvahati, evaṃ lokiyalokuttarā saddhāpi yathāsambhavaṃ lokiyalokuttaraṃ vipākaṃ sukhamāvahati,
atk-s0301a:1381_4: saddhādhurena paṭipannānaṃ jātijarādidukkhaṃ paṭibāhati, guṇadāliddiyaṃ vūpasameti,
atk-s0301a:1383: Yaṃ yaṃ padesaṃ bhajati, tattha tattheva pūjito”ti. –
atk-s0301a:1384_0: Vacanato lokasantatiñca āvahatīti katvā “vitta”nti vuttaṃ. Yasmā pana tesaṃ saddhāvittaṃ
atk-s0301a:1384_2: nidānaṃ. Saddhoyeva hi dānādīni puññāni katvā vittaṃ adhigacchati, assaddhassa pana
atk-s0301a:1384_3: vittaṃ yāvadeva anatthāya hoti, tasmā seṭṭhanti vuttaṃ. Purisassāti ukkaṭṭhaparicchedadesanā.
atk-s0301a:1384_4: Tasmā na kevalaṃ purisassa, itthiādīnampi saddhāvittameva seṭṭhanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0301a:1385_0: Dhammoti dasakusaladhammo, dānasīlabhāvanādhammo vā. Suciṇṇoti sukato sucarito. Sukhamāvahatīti
atk-s0301a:1385_1: soṇaseṭṭhiputtaraṭṭhapālādīnaṃ viya manussasukhaṃ, sakkādīnaṃ viya dibbasukhaṃ, pariyosāne
atk-s0301a:1386_0: Saccanti ayaṃ saccasaddo anekesu atthesu dissati. Seyyathidaṃ – “saccaṃ bhaṇe na
atk-s0301a:1386_1: kujjheyyā ” tiādīsu vācāsacce. “Sacce ṭhitā samaṇabrāhmaṇā cā”tiādīsu viratisacce.
atk-s0301a:1386_2: “Kasmā nu saccāni vadanti nānā, pavādiyāse kusalā vadānā”tiādīsu diṭṭhisacce. “Cattārimāni,
atk-s0301a:1386_3: bhikkhave, brāhmaṇasaccānī”tiādīsu brāhmaṇasacce. “Ekaṃ hi saccaṃ na dutiyamatthī”tiādīsu
atk-s0301a:1386_4: paramatthasacce. “Catunnaṃ saccānaṃ kati kusalā”tiādīsu ariyasacce. Idha pana paramatthasaccaṃ
atk-s0301a:1386_5: nibbānaṃ viratisaccañca abbhantaraṃ katvā vācāsaccaṃ adhippetaṃ, yassānubhāvena udakādīni
atk-s0301a:1395_0: Sādutaranti madhurataraṃ paṇītataraṃ. Rasānanti ye ime “mūlaraso khandharaso”tiādinā
atk-s0301a:1395_1: nayena sāyanīyadhammā, yecime “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, sabbaṃ phalarasaṃ, arasarūpo
atk-s0301a:1395_2: bhavaṃ gotamo, ye te, brāhmaṇa, rūparasā saddarasā, anāpatti rasarase, ayaṃ dhammavinayo
atk-s0301a:1395_3: ekaraso vimuttiraso, bhāgī vā bhagavā attharasassa dhammarasassā”tiādinā nayena rūpācārarasupavajjā
atk-s0301a:1395_4: avasesā byañjanādayo “dhammarasā”ti vuccanti. Tesaṃ rasānaṃ saccaṃ have sādutaraṃ
atk-s0301a:1395_5: saccameva sādutaraṃ. Sādhutaraṃ vā, seṭṭhataraṃ, uttamataraṃ. Mūlarasādayo hi sarīramupabrūhenti,
atk-s0301a:1395_7: cittaṃ upabrūheti, asaṃkilesikañca sukhamāvahati. Vimuttiraso paramatthasaccarasaparibhāvitattā
atk-s0301a:1395_8: sādu, attharasadhammarasā ca tadadhigamūpāyabhūtaṃ atthañca dhammañca nissāya pavattitoti.
atk-s0301a:1396_0: Paññājīviṃjīvitanti ettha pana yvāyaṃ andhekacakkhudvicakkhukesu dvicakkhupuggalo
atk-s0301a:1396_3: pabbajitapaṭipadaṃ paññāya ārādhetvā jīvati, tassa paññāya jīvino jīvitaṃ, taṃ vā
atk-s0301a:1397_0: Evaṃ bhagavatā vissajjite cattāropi pañhe sutvā attamano yakkho avasesepi cattāro
atk-s0301a:1397_1: pañhe pucchanto kathaṃsu tarati oghanti gāthamāha. Athassa bhagavā purimanayeneva
atk-s0301a:1397_2: vissajjento saddhāya taratīti gāthamāha. Tattha kiñcāpi yo catubbidhamoghaṃ tarati,
atk-s0301a:1397_3: so saṃsāraṇṇavampi tarati, vaṭṭadukkhampi acceti, kilesamalāpi parisujjhati, evaṃ
atk-s0301a:1397_4: santepi pana yasmā assaddho oghataraṇaṃ asaddahanto na pakkhandati, pañcasu kāmaguṇesu
atk-s0301a:1397_5: cittavossaggena pamatto tattheva visattattā saṃsāraṇṇavaṃ na tarati, kusīto dukkhaṃ
atk-s0301a:1397_6: viharati vokiṇṇo akusalehi dhammehi, appañño suddhimaggaṃ ajānanto na parisujjhati,
atk-s0301a:1397_7: tasmā tappaṭipakkhaṃ dassentena bhagavatā ayaṃ gāthā vuttā.
atk-s0301a:1398_0: Evaṃ vuttāya cetāya yasmā sotāpattiyaṅgapadaṭṭhānaṃ saddhindriyaṃ, tasmā saddhāya
atk-s0301a:1398_1: tarati oghanti iminā padena diṭṭhoghataraṇaṃ sotāpattimaggaṃ sotāpannañca pakāseti.
atk-s0301a:1398_2: Yasmā pana sotāpanno kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ bhāvanāya sātaccakiriyasaṅkhatena appamādena
atk-s0301a:1398_3: samannāgato dutiyamaggaṃ ārādhetvā ṭhapetvā sakidevimaṃ lokaṃ āgamanamaggaṃ avasesaṃ
atk-s0301a:1398_4: sotāpattimaggena atiṇṇaṃ bhavoghavatthuṃ saṃsāraṇṇavaṃ tarati, tasmā appamādena aṇṇavanti
atk-s0301a:1398_5: iminā padena bhavoghataraṇaṃ sakadāgāmimaggaṃ sakadāgāmiñca pakāseti. Yasmā ca sakadāgāmī
atk-s0301a:1398_6: vīriyena tatiyamaggaṃ ārādhetvā sakadāgāmimaggena anatītaṃ kāmoghavatthuṃ kāmoghasaññitañca
atk-s0301a:1398_7: kāmadukkhamacceti, tasmā vīriyena dukkhamaccetīti iminā padena kāmoghataraṇaṃ anāgāmimaggaṃ
atk-s0301a:1398_8: anāgāmiñca pakāseti. Yasmā pana anāgāmī vigatakāmasaññāya parisuddhāya paññāya ekantaparisuddhaṃ
atk-s0301a:1398_9: catutthamaggapaññaṃ ārādhetvā anāgāmimaggena appahīnaṃ avijjāsaṅkhātaṃ paramamalaṃ
atk-s0301a:1398_10: pajahati, tasmā paññāya parisujjhatīti, iminā padena avijjoghataraṇaṃ arahattamaggañca
atk-s0301a:1398_11: arahattañca pakāseti. Imāya ca arahattanikūṭena kathitāya gāthāya pariyosāne yakkho
atk-s0301a:1399_0: Idāni tameva “paññāya parisujjhatī”ti ettha vuttaṃ paññāpadaṃ gahetvā attano paṭibhānena
atk-s0301a:1399_1: lokiyalokuttaramissakaṃ pañhaṃ pucchanto kathaṃsu labhate paññanti imaṃ chappadaṃ
atk-s0301a:1399_2: gāthamāha. Tattha kathaṃsūti sabbattheva atthayuttipucchā honti. Ayaṃ hi paññādiatthaṃ
atk-s0301a:1399_3: ñatvā tassa yuttiṃ pucchati – “kathaṃ, kāya yuttiyā, kena kāraṇena paññaṃ labhatī”ti? Esa nayo dhanādīsu.
atk-s0301a:1400_0: Athassa bhagavā catūhi kāraṇehi paññālābhaṃ dassento saddahānotiādimāha. Tassattho
atk-s0301a:1400_1: – yena pubbabhāge kāyasucaritādibhedena aparabhāge ca sattatiṃsabodhipakkhiyabhedena
atk-s0301a:1400_2: dhammena arahanto buddhapaccekabuddhasāvakā nibbānaṃ pattā, taṃ saddahāno arahataṃ
atk-s0301a:1400_3: dhammaṃ nibbānapattiyā lokiyalokuttarapaññaṃ labhati, tañca kho na saddhāmattakeneva.
atk-s0301a:1400_4: Yasmā pana saddhājāto upasaṅkamati, upasaṅkamanto payirupāsati, payirupāsanto sotaṃ
atk-s0301a:1400_5: odahati, ohitasoto dhammaṃ suṇāti, tasmā upasaṅkamanato pabhuti yāva dhammassavanena
atk-s0301a:1400_6: sussūsaṃ labhati. Kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti – taṃ dhammaṃ saddahitvāpi ācariyupajjhāye kālena
atk-s0301a:1400_7: upasaṅkamitvā vattakaraṇena payirupāsitvā yadā payirupāsanāya ārādhitacittā kiñci
atk-s0301a:1400_8: vattukāmā honti. Atha adhigatāya sotukāmatāya sotaṃ odahitvā suṇanto labhatīti. Evaṃ
atk-s0301a:1400_9: sussūsampi ca satiavippavāsena appamatto subhāsitadubbhāsitaññutāya vicakkhaṇo eva
atk-s0301a:1401_0: Evaṃ yasmā saddhāya paññalābhasaṃvattanikaṃ paṭipadaṃ paṭipajjati, sussūsāya sakkaccaṃ
atk-s0301a:1401_1: paññādhigamūpāyaṃ suṇāti, appamādena gahitaṃ na pamussati. Vicakkhaṇatāya anūnādhikaṃ
atk-s0301a:1401_2: aviparītañca gahetvā vitthārikaṃ karoti. Sussūsāya vā ohitasoto paññāpaṭilābhahetuṃ
atk-s0301a:1401_3: dhammaṃ suṇāti, appamādena sutadhammaṃ dhāreti, vicakkhaṇatāya dhatānaṃ dhammānaṃ
atk-s0301a:1401_4: atthamupaparikkhati, athānupubbena paramatthasaccaṃ sacchikaroti, tasmāssa bhagavā
atk-s0301a:1401_5: “kathaṃsu labhate pañña”nti puṭṭho imāni cattāri kāraṇāni dassento imaṃ gāthamāha.
atk-s0301a:1402_0: Idāni tato pare tayo pañhe vissajjento patirūpakārīti imaṃ gāthamāha. Tattha desakālādīni
atk-s0301a:1402_1: ahāpetvā lokiyassa lokuttarassa vā dhanassa patirūpaṃ adhigamūpāyaṃ karotīti patirūpakārī.
atk-s0301a:1402_2: Dhuravāti cetasikavīriyavasena anikkhittadhuro. Uṭṭhātāti, “yo ca sītañca uṇhañca,
atk-s0301a:1402_3: tiṇā bhiyyo na maññatī”tiādinā nayena kāyikavīrīyavasena uṭṭhānasampanno asithilaparakkamo.
atk-s0301a:1402_4: Vindate dhananti ekamūsikāya nacirasseva catusatasahassasaṅkhaṃ cūḷantevāsī viya
atk-s0301a:1402_5: lokiyadhanañca, mahallakamahātissatthero viya lokuttaradhanañca labhati. So “tīhiyeva
atk-s0301a:1402_6: iriyāpathehi viharissāmī”ti vattaṃ katvā thinamiddhāgamanavelāya palālacumbaṭakaṃ
atk-s0301a:1402_7: temetvā sīse katvā galappamāṇaṃ udakaṃ pavisitvā thinamiddhaṃ paṭibāhanto dasahi
atk-s0301a:1402_8: vassehi arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Saccenāti vacīsaccenāpi “saccavādī bhūtavādī”ti, paramatthasaccenāpi
atk-s0301a:1402_9: “buddho paccekabuddho ariyasāvako”ti evaṃ kittiṃ pappoti. Dadanti yaṃkiñci icchitapatthitaṃ
atk-s0301a:1402_10: dadanto mittāni ganthati, sampādeti karotīti attho. Duddadaṃ vā dadaṃ taṃ ganthati.
atk-s0301a:1402_11: Dānamukhena vā cattāripi saṅgahavatthūni gahitānīti veditabbāni, tehi mittāni karotīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0301a:1403_0: Evaṃ gahaṭṭhapabbajitānaṃ sādhāraṇena lokiyalokuttaramissakena nayena cattāro pañhe
atk-s0301a:1403_1: vissajjetvā idāni “kathaṃ pecca na socatī”ti imaṃ pañcamaṃ pañhaṃ gahaṭṭhavasena
atk-s0301a:1403_2: vissajjento yassetetiādīmāha. Tassattho – yassa “saddahāno arahata”nti ettha vuttāya
atk-s0301a:1403_3: sabbakalyāṇadhammuppādikāya saddhāya samannāgatattā saddhassa, gharamesinoti gharāvāsaṃ
atk-s0301a:1403_4: pañca vā kāmaguṇe esantassa gavesantassa kāmabhogino gahaṭṭhassa “saccena kittiṃ
atk-s0301a:1403_5: pappotī”ti ettha vuttappakāraṃ saccaṃ. “Sussūsaṃ labhate pañña”nti ettha sussūsapaññānāmena
atk-s0301a:1403_6: vuttova damo. “Dhuravā uṭṭhātā”ti ettha dhuranāmena uṭṭhānanāmena ca vuttā dhiti.
atk-s0301a:1403_7: “Dadaṃ mittāni ganthatī”ti ettha vuttappakāro cāgo cāti ete caturo dhammā santi.
atk-s0301a:1403_8: Sa ve pecca na socatīti idhalokā paralokaṃ gantvā sa ve na socatīti.
atk-s0301a:1404_0: Evaṃ bhagavā pañcamampi pañhaṃ vissajjetvā taṃ yakkhaṃ codento iṅgha aññepītiādimāha.
atk-s0301a:1404_1: Tattha iṅghāti codanatthe nipāto. Aññepīti aññepi dhamme puthū samaṇabrāhmaṇe pucchassu.
atk-s0301a:1404_2: Aññepi vā pūraṇādayo sabbaññupaṭiññe puthū samaṇabrāhmaṇe pucchassu. Yadi amhehi
atk-s0301a:1404_3: “saccena kittiṃ pappotī”ti ettha vuttappakārā saccā bhiyyo kittippattikāraṇaṃ vā,
atk-s0301a:1404_4: “sussūsaṃ labhate pañña”nti ettha sussūsāti paññāpadesena vuttā dammā bhiyyo lokiyalokuttarapaññāpaṭilābhakāraṇaṃ
atk-s0301a:1404_5: vā, “dadaṃ mittāni ganthatī”ti ettha vuttappakārā cāgā bhiyyo mittaganthanakāraṇaṃ
atk-s0301a:1404_6: vā, “dhuravā uṭṭhātā”ti ettha taṃ taṃ atthavasaṃ paṭicca dhuranāmena uṭṭhānanāmena
atk-s0301a:1404_7: ca vuttāya mahābhārasahanatthena ussoḷhibhāvappattāya vīriyasaṅkhātāya khantyā bhiyyo
atk-s0301a:1404_8: lokiyalokuttaradhanavindanakāraṇaṃ vā, “saccaṃ dammo dhiti cāgo”ti evaṃ vuttehi imeheva
atk-s0301a:1404_9: catūhi dhammehi bhiyyo asmā lokā paraṃ lokaṃ pecca asocanakāraṇaṃ vā idha vijjatīti
atk-s0301a:1404_10: ayamettha saddhiṃ saṅkhepayojanāya atthavaṇṇanā. Vitthārato pana ekamekaṃ padaṃ atthuddhārapaduddhārapadavaṇṇanānayehi
atk-s0301a:1405_0: Evaṃ vutte yakkho yena saṃsayena aññe puccheyya, tassa pahīnattā kathaṃ nu dāni puccheyyaṃ,
atk-s0301a:1405_1: puthū samaṇabrāhmaṇeti vatvā yepissa apucchanakāraṇaṃ na jānanti, tepi jānāpento
atk-s0301a:1405_2: yohaṃ ajjapajānāmi, yo attho samparāyikoti āha. Tattha ajjāti ajjādiṃ katvāti adhippāyo.
atk-s0301a:1405_3: Pajānāmīti yathāvuttena pakārena jānāmi. Yo atthoti ettāvatā “sussūsaṃ labhate pañña”ntiādinā
atk-s0301a:1405_4: nayena vuttaṃ diṭṭhadhammikaṃ dasseti. Samparāyikoti iminā “yassete caturo dhammā”ti
atk-s0301a:1405_5: vuttaṃ pecca sokābhāvakāraṇaṃ samparāyikaṃ. Atthoti ca kāraṇassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0301a:1405_6: Ayaṃ hi atthasaddo “sātthaṃ sabyañjana”nti evamādīsu pāṭhatthe vattati. “Attho me,
atk-s0301a:1405_7: gahapati, hiraññasuvaṇṇenā”tiādīsu vicakkhaṇe. “Hoti sīlavataṃ attho”tiādīsu vuḍḍhimhi.
atk-s0301a:1405_9: jāte ca paṇḍita”ntiādīsu kāraṇe. Idha pana kāraṇe. Tasmā yaṃ paññādilābhādīnaṃ kāraṇaṃ
atk-s0301a:1405_10: diṭṭhadhammikaṃ, yañca pecca sokābhāvassa kāraṇaṃ samparāyikaṃ, taṃ yohaṃ ajja bhagavatā
atk-s0301a:1405_11: vuttanayena sāmaṃyeva pajānāmi, so kathaṃ nu dāni puccheyyaṃ puthū samaṇabrāhmaṇeti
atk-s0301a:1406_0: Evaṃ yakkho “pajānāmi yo attho samparāyiko”ti vatvā tassa ñāṇassa bhagavaṃmūlakattaṃ
atk-s0301a:1406_1: dassento atthāya vata me buddhoti āha. Tattha atthāyāti hitāya vuḍḍhiyā ca. Yattha
atk-s0301a:1406_2: dinnaṃ mahapphalanti “yassete caturo dhammā”ti ettha vuttacāgena yattha dinnaṃ mahapphalaṃ,
atk-s0301a:1406_3: taṃ aggadakkhiṇeyyaṃ buddhaṃ pajānāmīti attho. Keci pana “saṅghaṃ sandhāya evamāhā”ti bhaṇanti.
atk-s0301a:1407_0: Evaṃ imāya gāthāya attano hitādhigamaṃ dassetvā idāni sahitapaṭipattiṃ dīpento so
atk-s0301a:1407_1: ahaṃ vicarissāmītiādimāha. Tattha gāmā gāmanti devagāmā devagāmaṃ. Purā puranti devanagarato
atk-s0301a:1407_2: devanagaraṃ. Namassamāno sambuddhaṃ, dhammassa ca sudhammatanti “sammāsambuddho vata
atk-s0301a:1407_3: bhagavā, svākkhāto vata bhagavato dhammo”tiādinā nayena buddhasubodhitañca dhammasudhammatañca
atk-s0301a:1407_5: abhitthavitvā namassamāno dhammaghosako hutvā vicarissāmīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0301a:1408_0: Evamimāya gāthāya pariyosānañca rattivibhāvanañca sādhukārasadduṭṭhānañca āḷavakakumārassa
atk-s0301a:1408_1: yakkhabhavanaṃ ānayanañca ekakkhaṇeyeva ahosi. Rājapurisā sādhukārasaddaṃ sutvā –
atk-s0301a:1408_2: “evarūpo sādhukārasaddo ṭhapetvā buddhe na aññesaṃ abbhuggacchati, āgato nu kho bhagavā”ti
atk-s0301a:1408_3: āvajjentā bhagavato sarīrappabhaṃ disvā pubbe viya bahi aṭṭhatvā nibbisaṅkā antoyeva
atk-s0301a:1408_4: pavisitvā addasaṃsu bhagavantaṃ yakkhassa bhavane nisinnaṃ, yakkhañca añjaliṃ paggahetvā
atk-s0301a:1408_5: ṭhitaṃ. Disvāna yakkhaṃ āhaṃsu – “ayaṃ te, mahāyakkha, rājakumāro balikammāya ānīto,
atk-s0301a:1408_6: handa naṃ khāda vā bhuñja vā, yathāpaccayaṃ vā karohī”ti. So sotāpannattā lajjito
atk-s0301a:1408_7: visesena ca bhagavato purato evaṃ vuccamāno atha taṃ kumāraṃ ubhohi hatthehi paṭiggahetvā
atk-s0301a:1408_8: bhagavato upanāmesi “ayaṃ, bhante, kumāro mayhaṃ pesito, imāhaṃ bhagavato dammi,
atk-s0301a:1408_9: hitānukampakā buddhā, paṭiggaṇhātu, bhante, bhagavā imaṃ dārakaṃ imassa hitatthāya
atk-s0301a:1413_0: Paṭiggahesi bhagavā kumāraṃ. Paṭiggaṇhanto ca yakkhassa ca kumārassa ca maṅgalakaraṇatthaṃ
atk-s0301a:1413_1: pādūnagāthaṃ abhāsi. Taṃ yakkho kumāraṃ saraṇaṃ gamento tikkhattuṃ catutthapādena
atk-s0301a:1420_0: Atha bhagavā kumāraṃ rājapurisānaṃ adāsi – “imaṃ vaḍḍhetvā puna mameva dethā”ti.
atk-s0301a:1420_1: Evaṃ so kumāro rājapurisānaṃ hatthato yakkhassa hatthaṃ, yakkhassa hatthato bhagavato
atk-s0301a:1420_2: hatthaṃ, bhagavato hatthato puna rājapurisānaṃ hatthaṃ gatattā nāmato “hatthako āḷavako”ti
atk-s0301a:1420_3: jāto. Taṃ ādāya paṭinivatte rājapurise disvā kassakavanakammikādayo “kiṃ yakkho kumāraṃ
atk-s0301a:1420_4: atidaharattā na icchī”ti? Bhītā pucchiṃsu. Rājapurisā “mā bhāyatha. Khemaṃ kataṃ
atk-s0301a:1420_5: bhagavatā”ti sabbamārocesuṃ. Tato “sādhu sādhū”ti sakalaṃ āḷavinagaraṃ ekakolāhalena
atk-s0301a:1420_6: yakkhābhimukhaṃ ahosi. Yakkhopi bhagavato bhikkhācārakāle anuppatte pattacīvaraṃ
atk-s0301a:1421_0: Atha bhagavā nagare piṇḍāya caritvā katabhattakicco nagaradvāre aññatarasmiṃ vivitte
atk-s0301a:1421_1: rukkhamūle paññattabuddhāsane nisīdi. Tato mahājanakāyena saddhiṃ rājā ca nāgarā
atk-s0301a:1421_2: ca ekato sampiṇḍitvā bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamma vanditvā parivāretvā nisinnā – “kathaṃ,
atk-s0301a:1421_3: bhante, evaṃ dāruṇaṃ yakkhaṃ damayitthā”ti pucchiṃsu. Tesaṃ bhagavā yuddhamādiṃ katvā
atk-s0301a:1421_4: “evaṃ navavidhaṃ vassaṃ vassetvā evaṃ vibhiṃsanakaṃ akāsi, evaṃ pañhaṃ pucchi. Tassāhaṃ
atk-s0301a:1421_5: evaṃ vissajjesi”nti tamevāḷavakasuttaṃ kathesi. Kathāpariyosāne caturāsītipāṇasahassānaṃ
atk-s0301a:1421_6: dhammābhisamayo ahosi. Tato rājā ceva nāgarā ca vessavaṇamahārājassa bhavanasamīpe
atk-s0301a:1421_7: yakkhassa bhavanaṃ katvā pupphagandhādisakkārupetaṃ niccabaliṃ pavattesuṃ. Tañca
atk-s0301a:1421_8: kumāraṃ viññutaṃ pattaṃ “tvaṃ bhagavantaṃ nissāya jīvitaṃ labhi, gaccha bhagavantaṃyeva
atk-s0301a:1421_9: payirupāsassu bhikkhusaṅghañcā”ti vissajjesuṃ. So bhagavantañca bhikkhusaṅghañca
atk-s0301a:1421_10: payirupāsamāno nacirasseva anāgāmiphale patiṭṭhāya sabbaṃ buddhavacanaṃ uggahetvā
atk-s0301a:1421_11: pañcasataupāsakaparivāro ahosi. Bhagavā ca naṃ etadagge niddisi – “etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave,
atk-s0301a:1421_12: mama sāvakānaṃ upāsakānaṃ catūhi saṅgahavatthūhi parisaṃ saṅgaṇhantānaṃ yadidaṃ hatthako
atk-s0301a:1430_0: 247. Sakkasaṃyuttassa paṭhame abhiyaṃsūti kadā abhiyaṃsu? Yadā balavanto ahesuṃ,
atk-s0301a:1430_1: tadā. Tatrāyaṃ anupubbikathā – sakko kira magadharaṭṭhe macalagāmake magho nāma māṇavo
atk-s0301a:1430_2: hutvā tettiṃsa purise gahetvā kalyāṇakammaṃ karonto satta vatapadāni pūretvā tattha
atk-s0301a:1430_3: kālaṅkato devaloke nibbatti. Taṃ balavakammānubhāvena saparisaṃ sesadevatā dasahi
atk-s0301a:1430_4: ṭhānehi adhigaṇhantaṃ disvā “āgantukadevaputtā āgatā”ti nevāsikā gandhapānaṃ sajjayiṃsu.
atk-s0301a:1430_5: Sakko sakaparisāya saññaṃ adāsi – “mārisā mā gandhapānaṃ pivittha, pivanākāramattameva
atk-s0301a:1430_6: dassethā”ti. Te tattha akaṃsu. Nevāsikadevatā suvaṇṇasarakehi upanītaṃ gandhapānaṃ
atk-s0301a:1430_7: yāvadatthaṃ pivitvā mattā tattha tattha suvaṇṇapathaviyaṃ patitvā sayiṃsu. Sakko
atk-s0301a:1430_8: “gaṇhatha puttahatāya putte”ti te pādesu gahetvā sinerupāde khipāpesi. Sakkassa puññatejena
atk-s0301a:1430_9: tadanuvattakāpi sabbe tattheva patiṃsu. Te sineruvemajjhakāle saññaṃ labhitvā, “tātā
atk-s0301a:1430_10: na suraṃ pivimha, na suraṃ pivimhā”ti āhaṃsu. Tato paṭṭhāya asurā nāma jātā. Atha
atk-s0301a:1430_11: nesaṃ kammapaccayautusamuṭṭhānaṃ sinerussa heṭṭhimatale dasayojanasahassaṃ asurabhavanaṃ
atk-s0301a:1430_12: nibbatti. Sakko tesaṃ nivattetvā anāgamanatthāya ārakkhaṃ ṭhapesi, yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ –
atk-s0301a:1435_0: Dve nagarāni hi yuddhena gahetuṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya ayujjhapurāni nāma jātāni devanagarañca
atk-s0301a:1435_1: asuranagarañca. Yadā hi asurā balavanto honti, atha devehi palāyitvā devanagaraṃ
atk-s0301a:1435_2: pavisitvā dvāre pidahite asurānaṃ satasahassampi kiñci kātuṃ na sakkoti. Yadā devā
atk-s0301a:1435_3: balavanto honti, athāsurehi palāyitvā asuranagarassa dvāre pidahite sakkānaṃ satasahassampi
atk-s0301a:1435_4: kiñci kātuṃ na sakkoti. Iti imāni dve nagarāni ayujjhapurāni nāma. Nesaṃ antarā etesu
atk-s0301a:1435_5: udakādīsu pañcasu ṭhānesu sakkena ārakkhā ṭhapitā. Tattha udakasaddena nāgā gahitā.
atk-s0301a:1435_6: Te hi udake balavanto honti. Tasmā sinerussa paṭhamālinde tesaṃ ārakkhā. Karoṭisaddena
atk-s0301a:1435_7: supaṇṇā gahitā. Tesaṃ kira karoṭi nāma pānabhojanaṃ, tena taṃ nāmaṃ labhiṃsu. Dutiyālinde
atk-s0301a:1435_8: tesaṃ ārakkhā. Payassahārīsaddena kumbhaṇḍā gahitā. Dānavarakkhasā kira te. Tatiyālinde
atk-s0301a:1435_9: tesaṃ ārakkhā. Madanayutasaddena yakkhā gahitā. Visamacārino kirate yujjhasoṇḍā.
atk-s0301a:1435_10: Catutthālinde tesaṃ ārakkhā. Caturo ca mahantāti cattāro mahārājāno vuttā. Pañcamālinde
atk-s0301a:1435_11: tesaṃ ārakkhā. Tasmā yadi asurā kupitāvilacittā devapuraṃ upayanti yuddhesū, yaṃ
atk-s0301a:1435_12: girino paṭhamaṃ paribhaṇḍaṃ, taṃ uragā paṭibāhanti evaṃ sesesu sesā.
atk-s0301a:1436_0: Te pana asurā āyuvaṇṇarasaissariyasampattīhi tāvatiṃsasadisāva. Tasmā antarā attānaṃ
atk-s0301a:1436_1: ajānitvā pāṭaliyā pupphitāya, “na idaṃ devanagaraṃ, tattha pāricchattako pupphati,
atk-s0301a:1436_2: idha pana cittapāṭalī, jarasakkenāmhākaṃ suraṃ pāyetvā vañcitā, devanagarañca no
atk-s0301a:1436_3: gahitaṃ, gacchāma tena saddhiṃ yujjhissāmā”ti hatthiassarathe āruyha suvaṇṇarajatamaṇiphalakāni
atk-s0301a:1436_4: gahetvā, yuddhasajjā hutvā, asurabheriyo vādentā mahāsamudde udakaṃ dvidhā bhetvā
atk-s0301a:1436_5: uṭṭhahanti. Te deve vuṭṭhe vammikamakkhikā vammikaṃ viya sineruṃ abhiruhitu ārabhanti.
atk-s0301a:1436_6: Atha nesaṃ paṭhamaṃ nāgehi saddhiṃ yuddhaṃ hoti. Tasmiṃ kho pana yuddhe na kassaci
atk-s0301a:1436_7: chavi vā cammaṃ vā chijjati, na lohitaṃ uppajjati, kevalaṃ kumārakānaṃ dārumeṇḍakayuddhaṃ
atk-s0301a:1436_8: viya aññamaññaṃ santāsanamattameva hoti. Koṭisatāpi koṭisahassāpi nāgā tehi saddhiṃ
atk-s0301a:1437_0: Yadā pana asurā balavanto honti, atha nāgā osakkitvā dutiye ālinde supaṇṇehi saddhiṃ
atk-s0301a:1437_1: ekatova hutvā yujjhanti. Esa nayo supaṇṇādīsūpi. Yadā pana tāni pañcapi ṭhānāni asurā
atk-s0301a:1437_2: maddanti, tadā ekato sampiṇḍitānipi pañca balāni osakkanti. Atha cattāro mahārājāno
atk-s0301a:1437_3: gantvā sakkassa taṃ pavattiṃ ārocenti. Sakko tesaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā diyaḍḍhayojanasatikaṃ
atk-s0301a:1437_4: vejayantarathaṃ āruyha sayaṃ vā nikkhamati, ekaṃ vā puttaṃ peseti. Imasmiṃ pana kāle
atk-s0301a:1438_0: Evaṃ bhaddantavāti khoti evaṃ hotu bhaddaṃ tava iti kho. Pamādaṃ āpādesīti pamādaṃ
atk-s0301a:1438_1: akāsi. Accharāsaṅghaparivuto saṭṭhiyojanaṃ vitthārena suvaṇṇamahāvīthiṃ otaritvā
atk-s0301a:1439_0: Anuṭṭhahanti anuṭṭhahanto. Avāyāmanti avāyamanto. Alasvassāti alaso assa. Na ca kiccāni
atk-s0301a:1439_1: kārayeti kiñci kiccaṃ nāma na kareyya. Sabbakāmasamiddhassāti sabbakāmehi samiddho
atk-s0301a:1439_2: assa. Taṃ me, sakka, varaṃ disāti, sakka devaseṭṭha, taṃ me varaṃ uttamaṃ ṭhānaṃ
atk-s0301a:1439_3: okāsaṃ disaṃ ācikkha kathehīti vadati. Nibbānassa hi so maggoti kammaṃ akatvā jīvitaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0301a:1441: 248. Dutiye susīmanti attano puttasahassassa antare evaṃnāmakaṃ ekaṃ puttameva. Dutiyaṃ.
atk-s0301a:1443_0: 249. Tatiye samupabyūḷhoti sampiṇḍito rāsibhūto. Dhajaggaṃ ullokeyyathāti sakkassa
atk-s0301a:1443_1: kira diyaḍḍhayojanasatāyāmo ratho. Tassa hi pacchimanto paṇṇāsayojano, majjhe rathapañjaro
atk-s0301a:1443_2: paṇṇāsayojano, rathasandhito yāva rathasīsā paṇṇāsayojanāni. Tadeva pamāṇaṃ diguṇaṃ
atk-s0301a:1443_3: katvā tiyojanasatāyāmotipi vadantiyeva. Tasmiṃ yojanikapallaṅko atthato, tiyojanikaṃ
atk-s0301a:1443_4: setacchattaṃ matthake ṭhapitaṃ, ekasmiṃyeva yuge sahassaājaññā yuttā, sesālaṅkārassa
atk-s0301a:1443_5: pamāṇaṃ natthi. Dhajo panassa aḍḍhatiyāni yojanasatāni uggato, yassa vātāhatassa
atk-s0301a:1443_6: pañcaṅgikatūriyasseva saddo niccharati, taṃ ullokeyyāthāti vadati. Kasmā? Taṃ passantānañhi
atk-s0301a:1443_7: rājā no āgantvā parisapariyante nikhātathambho viya ṭhito, kassa mayaṃ bhāyāmāti
atk-s0301a:1443_8: bhayaṃ na hoti. Pajāpatissāti so kira sakkena samānavaṇṇo samānāyuko dutiyaṃ āsanaṃ
atk-s0301a:1443_9: labhati. Tathā varuṇo īsāno ca. Varuṇo pana tatiyaṃ āsanaṃ labhati, īsāno catutthaṃ.
atk-s0301a:1443_10: Palāyīti asurehi parājito tasmiṃ rathe ṭhito appamattakampi rajadhajaṃ disvā palāyanadhammo.
atk-s0301a:1444_0: Itipi so bhagavātiādīni visuddhimagge vitthāritāneva. Idamavocāti idaṃ dhajaggaparittaṃ
atk-s0301a:1444_1: nāma bhagavā avoca, yassa āṇākhette koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷe ānubhāvo vattati. Idaṃ
atk-s0301a:1444_2: āvajjetvā hi yakkhabhayacorabhayādīhi dukkhehi muttānaṃ anto natthi. Tiṭṭhatu aññadukkhavūpasamo,
atk-s0301a:1444_3: idaṃ āvajjamāno hi pasannacitto ākāsepi patiṭṭhaṃ labhati.
atk-s0301a:1445_0: Tatridaṃ vatthu – dīghavāpicetiyamhi kira sudhākamme kayiramāne eko daharo muddhavedikāpādato
atk-s0301a:1445_1: patitvā cetiyakucchiyā bhassati. Heṭṭhā ṭhito bhikkhusaṅgho “dhajaggaparittaṃ, āvuso,
atk-s0301a:1445_2: āvajjāhī”ti āha. So maraṇabhayena tajjito “dhajaggaparittaṃ maṃ rakkhatū”ti āha.
atk-s0301a:1445_3: Tāvadevassa cetiyakucchito dve iṭṭhakā nikkhamitvā sopānaṃ hutvā aṭṭhaṃsu, upariṭṭhito
atk-s0301a:1445_4: vallinisseṇiṃ otāresuṃ. Tasmiṃ nisseṇiyaṃ ṭhite iṭṭhakā yathāṭṭhāneyeva aṭṭhaṃsu. Tatiyaṃ.
atk-s0301a:1447_0: 250. Catutthe vepacittīti so kira asurānaṃ sabbajeṭṭhako. Yenāti nipātamattaṃ nanti
atk-s0301a:1447_1: ca. Kaṇṭhapañcamehīti dvīsu hatthesu pādesu kaṇṭhe cāti evaṃ pañcahi bandhanehi.
atk-s0301a:1447_2: Tāni pana naḷinasuttaṃ viya makkaṭakasuttaṃ viya ca cakkhussāpāthaṃ āgacchanti, iriyāpathaṃ
atk-s0301a:1447_3: rujjhanti. Tehi pana citteneva bajjhati, citteneva muccati. Akkosatīti corosi bālosi
atk-s0301a:1447_4: mūḷhosi thenosi oṭṭhosi goṇosi gadrabhosi nerayikosi tiracchānagatosi, natthi tuyhaṃ
atk-s0301a:1447_5: sugati, duggatiyeva tuyhaṃ pāṭikaṅkhāti imehi dasahi akkosavatthūhi akkosati. Paribhāsatīti,
atk-s0301a:1447_6: jarasakka, na tvaṃ sabbakālaṃ jinissasi, yadā asurānaṃ jayo bhavissati, tadā tampi
atk-s0301a:1447_7: evaṃ bandhitvā asurabhavanassa dvāre nipajjāpetvā pothāpessāmīti ādīni vatvā tajjeti.
atk-s0301a:1447_8: Sakko vijitavijayo na taṃ manasi karoti, mahāpaṭiggahaṇaṃ panassa matthake vidhunanto
atk-s0301a:1447_9: sudhammadevasabhaṃ pavisati ceva nikkhamati ca. Ajjhabhāsīti “kiṃ nu kho esa sakko
atk-s0301a:1447_10: imāni pharusavacanāni bhayena titikkhati, udāhu adhivāsanakhantiyā samannāgatattā”ti? Vīmaṃsanto abhāsi.
atk-s0301a:1448_0: Dubbalyā noti dubbalabhāvena nu. Paṭisaṃyujeti paṭisaṃyujeyya paṭipphareyya. Pabhijjeyyunti
atk-s0301a:1448_1: virajjeyyuṃ. Pakujjheyyuntipi pāṭho. Paranti paccatthikaṃ. Yo sato upasammatīti yo
atk-s0301a:1448_2: satimā hutvā upasammati, tassa upasamaṃyevāhaṃ bālassa paṭisedhanaṃ maññeti attho.
atk-s0301a:1448_3: Yadā naṃ maññatīti yasmā taṃ maññati. Ajjhāruhatīti ajjhottharati. Gova bhiyyo palāyinanti
atk-s0301a:1448_4: yathā goyuddhe tāvadeva dve gāvo yujjhante gogaṇo olokento tiṭṭhati, yadā pana eko
atk-s0301a:1448_5: palāyati, atha naṃ palāyantaṃ sabbo gogaṇo bhiyyo ajjhottharati. Evaṃ dummedho khamantaṃ
atk-s0301a:1449_0: Sadatthaparamāti sakatthaparamā. Khantyā bhiyyo na vijjatīti tesu sakaatthaparamesu
atk-s0301a:1449_1: atthesu khantito uttaritaro añño attho na vijjati. Tamāhu paramaṃ khantinti yo balavā
atk-s0301a:1449_2: titikkhati, tassa taṃ khantiṃ paramaṃ āhu. Bālabalaṃ nāma aññāṇabalaṃ. Taṃ yassa
atk-s0301a:1449_3: balaṃ, abalameva taṃ balanti āhu kathentīti dīpeti. Dhammaguttassāti dhammena rakkhitassa,
atk-s0301a:1449_4: dhammaṃ vā rakkhantassa. Paṭivattāti paṭippharitvā vattā, paṭippharitvā vā bālabalanti
atk-s0301a:1449_5: vadeyyāpi, dhammaṭṭhaṃ pana cāletuṃ samattho nāma natthi. Tasseva tena pāpiyoti tena
atk-s0301a:1449_6: kodhena tasseva puggalassa pāpaṃ. Katarassa? Yo kuddhaṃ paṭikujjhati. Tikicchantānanti
atk-s0301a:1449_7: ekavacane bahuvacanaṃ, tikicchantanti attho. Janā maññantīti evarūpaṃ attano ca parassa
atk-s0301a:1449_8: cāti ubhinnaṃ atthaṃ tikicchantaṃ nipphādentaṃ puggalaṃ “andhabālo aya”nti andhabālaputhujjanāva
atk-s0301a:1449_9: evaṃ maññanti. Dhammassa akovidāti catusaccadhamme achekā. Idhāti imasmiṃ sāsane.
atk-s0301a:1451_0: 251. Pañcame asurindaṃ etadavocāti chekatāya etaṃ avoca. Evaṃ kirassa ahosi “parassa
atk-s0301a:1451_1: nāma gāhaṃ mocetvā paṭhamaṃ vattuṃ garu. Parassa vacanaṃ anugantvā pana pacchā sukhaṃ
atk-s0301a:1451_2: vattu”nti. Pubbadevāti devaloke ciranivāsino pubbasāmikā, tumhākaṃ tāva paveṇiāgataṃ
atk-s0301a:1451_3: bhaṇathāti. Adaṇḍāvacarāti daṇḍāvacaraṇarahitā, daṇḍaṃ vā satthaṃ vā gahetabbanti
atk-s0301a:1453_0: 252. Chaṭṭhe ajjhabhāsīti tassa kira simbalivanābhimukhassa jātassa rathasaddo ca
atk-s0301a:1453_1: ājānīyasaddo dhajasaddo ca samantā asanipātasaddo viya ahosi. Taṃ sutvā simbalivane
atk-s0301a:1453_2: balavasupaṇṇā palāyiṃsu, jarājiṇṇā ceva rogadubbalā ca asañjātapakkhapotakā ca palāyituṃ
atk-s0301a:1453_3: asakkontā, maraṇabhayena tajjitā ekappahāreneva mahāviravaṃ viraviṃsu. Sakko taṃ
atk-s0301a:1453_4: sutvā “kassa saddo, tātā”ti? Mātaliṃ pucchi. Rathasaddaṃ, te deva, sutvā supaṇṇā
atk-s0301a:1453_5: palāyituṃ asakkontā viravantīti. Taṃ sutvā karuṇāsamāvajjitahadayo abhāsi. Īsāmukhenāti
atk-s0301a:1453_6: rathassa īsāmukhena. Yathā kulāvake īsāmukhaṃ na sañcuṇṇeti, evaṃ iminā īsāmukhena
atk-s0301a:1453_7: te parivajjaya. So hi ratho puññapaccayanibbatto cakkavāḷapabbatepi sinerumhipi sammukhībhūte
atk-s0301a:1453_8: vinivijjhitvāva gacchati na sajjati, ākāsagatasadiseneva gacchati. Sace tena simbalivanena
atk-s0301a:1453_9: gato bhaveyya, yathā mahāsakaṭe kadalivanamajjhena vā eraṇḍavanamajjhena vā gacchante
atk-s0301a:1453_10: sabbavanaṃ vibhaggaṃ nimmathitaṃ hoti, evaṃ tampi simbalivanaṃ bhaveyya. Chaṭṭhaṃ.
atk-s0301a:1455_0: 253. Sattame upasaṅkamīti “ayaṃ sakko ‘yopi me assa supaccatthiko, tassa pāhaṃ na
atk-s0301a:1455_1: dubbheyya’nti cinteti, mayā tassa paccatthikataro nāma natthi, vīmaṃsissāmi tāva
atk-s0301a:1455_2: naṃ, kiṃ nu kho maṃ passitvā dubbhati, na dubbhatī”ti cintetvā upasaṅkami. Tiṭṭha
atk-s0301a:1455_3: vepacitti gahitosīti vepacitti, ettheva tiṭṭha, gahito tvaṃ mayāti vadati. Saha vacanenevassa
atk-s0301a:1455_4: so kaṇṭhapañcamehi bandhanehi baddhova ahosi. Sapassu ca meti mayi adubbhatthāya
atk-s0301a:1455_5: sapathaṃ karohīti vadati. Yaṃ musābhaṇato pāpanti imasmiṃ kappe paṭhamakappikesu
atk-s0301a:1455_6: cetiyarañño pāpaṃ sandhāyāha. Ariyūpavādinoti kokalikassa viya pāpaṃ. Mittadduno
atk-s0301a:1455_7: ca yaṃ pāpanti mahākapijātake mahāsatte duṭṭhacittassa pāpaṃ. Akataññunoti devadattasadisassa
atk-s0301a:1455_8: akataññuno pāpaṃ. Imāni kira imasmiṃ kappe cattāri mahāpāpāni. Sattamaṃ.
atk-s0301a:1457_0: 254. Aṭṭhame aṭṭhaṃsūti dvārapālarūpakāni viya ṭhitā. Nipphadāti nipphatti, yāva
atk-s0301a:1457_1: attho nipphajjati, tāva vāyamethevāti vadati. Dutiyagāthā sakkassa. Tattha khantyā
atk-s0301a:1457_2: bhiyyoti nipphannasobhanesu atthesu khantito uttaritaro attho nāma natthi. Atthajātāti
atk-s0301a:1457_3: kiccajātā. Soṇasiṅgālādayopi hi upādāya akiccajāto satto nāma natthi. Ito etto gamanamattampi
atk-s0301a:1457_4: kiccameva hoti. Saṃyogaparamā tveva, sambhogā sabbapāṇinanti pārivāsikaodanādīni
atk-s0301a:1457_5: hi asambhogārahāni honti, tāni puna uṇhāpetvā bhajjitvā sappimadhuphāṇitādīhi saṃyojitāni
atk-s0301a:1457_6: sambhogārahāni honti. Tenāha “saṃyogaparamā tveva, sambhogā sabbapāṇina”nti. Nipphannasobhano
atk-s0301a:1457_7: atthoti ime atthā nāma nipphannāva sobhanti. Puna catutthagāthā sakkassa. Tatthāpi
atk-s0301a:1459_0: 255. Navame paṇṇakuṭīsu sammantīti himavantapadese ramaṇīye araññāyatane rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānacaṅkamanādīhi
atk-s0301a:1459_1: sampannāsu paṇṇasālāsu vasanti. Sakko ca devānamindo vepacitti cāti ime dve janā
atk-s0301a:1459_2: jāmātikasasurā kālena kalahaṃ karonti, kālena ekato caranti, imasmiṃ pana kāle ekato
atk-s0301a:1459_3: caranti. Paṭaliyoti gaṇaṅgaṇūpāhanā. Khaggaṃ olaggetvāti khaggaṃ aṃse olaggetvā.
atk-s0301a:1459_4: Chattenāti dibbasetacchattena matthake dhārayamānena. Apabyāmato karitvāti byāmato
atk-s0301a:1459_5: akatvā. Ciradikkhitānanti cirasamādiṇṇavatānaṃ. Ito paṭikkammāti “ito pakkama parivajjaya,
atk-s0301a:1459_6: mā uparivāte tiṭṭhā”ti vadanti. Na hettha devāti etasmiṃ sīlavantānaṃ gandhe devā
atk-s0301a:1461_1: vālukapuḷine vuttappakārāsu paṇṇasālāsu vasanti. Siyāpi noti siyāpi amhākaṃ. Abhayadakkhiṇaṃ
atk-s0301a:1461_2: yāceyyāmāti abhayadānaṃ yāceyyāma. Yebhuyyena kira devāsurasaṅgāmo mahāsamuddapiṭṭhe
atk-s0301a:1461_3: hoti. Asurānaṃ na sabbakālaṃ jayo hoti, bahuvāre parājayova hoti. Te devehi parājitā
atk-s0301a:1461_4: palāyantā isīnaṃ assamapadena gacchantā “sakko imehi saddhiṃ mantetvā amhe nāseti,
atk-s0301a:1461_5: gaṇhatha puttahatāya putte”ti kupitā assamapade pānīyaghaṭacaṅkamanasālādīni viddhaṃsenti.
atk-s0301a:1461_6: Isayo araññato phalāphalaṃ ādāya āgatā naṃ disvā puna dukkhena paṭipākatikaṃ karonti.
atk-s0301a:1461_7: Tepi punappunaṃ tatheva vināsenti. Tasmā “idāni tesaṃ saṅgāmo paccupaṭṭhito”ti sutvā evaṃ cintayiṃsu.
atk-s0301a:1462_0: Kāmaṃkaroti icchitakaro. Bhayassa abhayassa vāti bhayaṃ vā abhayaṃ vā. Idaṃ vuttaṃ
atk-s0301a:1462_1: hoti – sace tvaṃ abhayaṃ dātukāmo, abhayaṃ dātuṃ pahosi. Sace bhayaṃ dātukāmo. Bhayaṃ
atk-s0301a:1462_2: dātuṃ pahosi. Amhākaṃ pana abhayadānaṃ dehīti. Duṭṭhānanti viruddhānaṃ. Pavuttanti
atk-s0301a:1463_0: Tikkhattuṃ ubbijjīti sāyamāsabhattaṃ bhuñjitvā sayanaṃ abhiruyha nipanno niddāya
atk-s0301a:1463_1: okkantamattāya samantā ṭhatvā sattisatena pahaṭo viya viravanto uṭṭhahati, dasayojanasahassaṃ
atk-s0301a:1463_2: asurabhavanaṃ “kimida”nti saṅkhobhaṃ āpajjati. Atha naṃ āgantvā “kimida”nti pucchanti.
atk-s0301a:1463_3: So “na kiñcī”ti vadati. Dutiyayāmādīsupi eseva nayo. Iti asurānaṃ “mā bhāyi, mahārājā”ti
atk-s0301a:1463_4: taṃ assāsentānaṃyeva aruṇaṃ uggacchati. Evamassa tato paṭṭhāya gelaññajātaṃ cittaṃ
atk-s0301a:1463_5: vepati. Teneva cassa “vepacittī”ti aparaṃ nāmaṃ udapādīti. Dasamaṃ.
atk-s0301a:1467_0: 257. Dutiyavaggassa paṭhame vatapadānīti vatakoṭṭhāsāni. Samattānīti paripuṇṇāni.
atk-s0301a:1467_1: Samādinnānīti gahitāni. Kule jeṭṭhāpacāyīti kulajeṭṭhakānaṃ mahāpitā mahāmātā cūḷapitā
atk-s0301a:1467_2: cūḷamātā mātulo mātulānītiādīnaṃ apacitikārako. Saṇhavācoti piyamudumadhuravāco.
atk-s0301a:1467_3: Muttacāgoti vissaṭṭhacāgo. Payatapāṇīti deyyadhammadānatthāya sadā dhotahattho. Vossaggaratoti
atk-s0301a:1467_4: vossajjane rato. Yācayogoti parehi yācitabbāraho, yācayogoti vā yācayogeneva yutto.
atk-s0301a:1467_5: Dānasaṃvibhāgaratoti dāne ca saṃvibhāge ca rato. Paṭhamaṃ.
atk-s0301a:1469_0: 258. Dutiye manussabhūtoti magadharaṭṭhe macalagāme manussabhūto. Āvasathaṃ adāsīti
atk-s0301a:1469_1: catumahāpathe mahājanassa āvasathaṃ kāretvā adāsi. Sahassampi atthānanti sahassampi
atk-s0301a:1469_2: kāraṇānaṃ, janasahassena vā vacanasahassena vā osārite “ayaṃ imassa attho, ayaṃ imassa
atk-s0301a:1471_0: 259. Tatiye upasaṅkamīti “sakko devarājāti kathenti, atthi nu kho so sakko, yena
atk-s0301a:1471_1: so diṭṭhapubboti imamatthaṃ dasabalaṃ pucchissāmī”ti upasaṅkami. Tañca pajānāmīti
atk-s0301a:1471_2: bahuvacane ekavacanaṃ, te ca dhamme pajānāmīti attho. Sakko kira anantare attabhāve
atk-s0301a:1471_3: magadharaṭṭhe macalagāme magho nāma māṇavo ahosi paṇḍito byatto, bodhisattacariyā
atk-s0301a:1471_4: viya ca tassa cariyā ahosi. So tettiṃsa purise gahetvā kalyāṇamakāsi. Ekadivasaṃ
atk-s0301a:1471_5: attanova paññāya upaparikkhitvā gāmamajjhe mahājanassa sannipatitaṭṭhāne kacavaraṃ
atk-s0301a:1471_6: ubhatopassesu apabyūhitvā taṃ ṭhānaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ akāsi. Puna tattheva maṇḍapaṃ kāresi.
atk-s0301a:1471_7: Puna gacchante kāle sālaṃ kāresi. Gāmato ca nikkhamitvā gāvutampi aḍḍhayojanampi
atk-s0301a:1471_8: tigāvutampi yojanampi vicaritvā tehi sahāyehi saddhiṃ visamaṃ samaṃ akāsi. Te sabbeva
atk-s0301a:1471_11: Magho satta vatapadāni pūretvā kāyassa bhedā saddhiṃ sahāyehi tāvatiṃsabhavane nibbatti.
atk-s0301a:1471_12: Taṃ sabbaṃ bhagavā jānāti. Tenāha – yesaṃ dhammānaṃ samādinnattā sakko sakkattaṃ
atk-s0301a:1471_13: ajjhagā, tañca pajānāmīti. Ayaṃ sakkassa sakkattādhigame saṅkhepakathā, vitthāro
atk-s0301a:1471_14: pana sumaṅgalavilāsiniyā dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathāya sakkapaṇhavaṇṇanāyaṃ vutto. Tatiyaṃ.
atk-s0301a:1473_0: 260. Catutthe manussadaliddoti manussaadhano. Manussakapaṇoti manussakāruññataṃ patto.
atk-s0301a:1473_1: Manussavarākoti manussalāmako. Tatrāti tasmiṃ ṭhāne, tasmiṃ vā atirocane. Ujjhāyantīti
atk-s0301a:1473_2: avajjhāyanti lāmakato cintenti. Khiyantīti kathenti pakāsenti. Vipācentīti tattha
atk-s0301a:1473_3: tattha kathenti vitthārenti. Eso kho mārisāti ettha ayamanupubbikathā – so kira anuppanne
atk-s0301a:1473_4: buddhe kāsiraṭṭhe bārāṇasirājā hutvā samussitaddhajapaṭākanānālaṅkārena suṭṭhu alaṅkataṃ
atk-s0301a:1473_5: nagaraṃ padakkhiṇaṃ akāsi attano sirisampattiyā samākaḍḍhitanettena janakāyena samullokiyamāno.
atk-s0301a:1473_6: Tasmiñca samaye eko paccekabuddho gandhamādanapabbatā āgamma tasmiṃ nagare piṇḍāya
atk-s0301a:1473_7: carati, santindriyo santamānaso uttamadamathasamannāgato. Mahājanopi rājagataṃ cittīkāraṃ
atk-s0301a:1473_8: pahāya paccekabuddhameva olokesi. Rājā – “idāni imasmiṃ janakāye ekopi maṃ na oloketi.
atk-s0301a:1473_9: Kiṃ nu kho eta”nti? Olokento paccekabuddhaṃ addasa. Sopi paccekabuddho mahallako
atk-s0301a:1473_10: hoti pacchimavaye ṭhito. Cīvarānipissa jiṇṇāni, tato tato suttāni gaḷanti. Rañño
atk-s0301a:1473_11: satasahassādhikāni dve asaṅkhyeyyāni pūritapāramiṃ paccekabuddhaṃ disvā cittapasādamattaṃ
atk-s0301a:1473_12: vā hatthaṃ pasāretvā vandanamattaṃ vā nāhosi. So rājā “pabbajito maññe esa usūyāya
atk-s0301a:1473_13: maṃ na oloketī”ti kujjhitvā “kvāyaṃ kuṭṭhicīvarāni pāruto”ti niṭṭhubhitvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0301a:1473_14: Tassa kammassa vipākena mahāniraye nibbattitvā vipākāvasesena manussalokaṃ āgacchanto
atk-s0301a:1473_15: rājagahe paramakapaṇāya itthiyā kucchimhi paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi. Gahitakālato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0301a:1473_16: sā itthī kañjikamattampi udarapūraṃ nālattha. Tassa kucchigatasseva kaṇṇanāsā vilīnā,
atk-s0301a:1473_17: saṅkhapalitakuṭṭhī hutvā mātukucchito nikkhanto. Mātāpitaro nāma dukkarakārikā honti,
atk-s0301a:1473_18: tenassa mātā yāva kapālaṃ gahetvā carituṃ na sakkoti, tāvassa kañjikampi udakampi
atk-s0301a:1473_19: āharitvā adāsi. Bhikkhāya carituṃ samatthakāle panassa kapālaṃ hatthe datvā “paññāyissasi
atk-s0301a:1474_0: Athassa tato paṭṭhāya sakalasarīrato maṃsāni chijjitvā chijjitvā patanti, yūsaṃ paggharati,
atk-s0301a:1474_1: mahāvedanā vattanti. Yaṃ yaṃ racchaṃ nissāya sayati, sabbarattiṃ mahāravena ravati.
atk-s0301a:1474_2: Tassa kāruññaparidevitasaddena sakalavīthiyaṃ manussā sabbarattiṃ niddaṃ na labhanti.
atk-s0301a:1474_3: Tassa tato paṭṭhāya sukhasayite pabodhetīti suppabuddhotveva nāmaṃ udapādi. Athāparena
atk-s0301a:1474_4: samayena bhagavati rājagahaṃ sampatte nāgarā satthāraṃ nimantetvā nagaramajjhe mahāmaṇḍapaṃ
atk-s0301a:1474_5: katvā dānaṃ adaṃsu. Suppabuddhopi kuṭṭhī gantvā dānaggamaṇḍapassa avidūre nisīdi.
atk-s0301a:1474_6: Nāgarā buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ paṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena parivisantā
atk-s0301a:1474_7: tassāpi yāgubhattaṃ adaṃsu. Tassa paṇītabhojanaṃ bhuttassa cittaṃ ekaggaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0301a:1474_8: Satthā bhattakiccāvasāne anumodanaṃ katvā saccāni dīpesi, suppabuddho nisinnaṭṭhāne
atk-s0301a:1474_9: nisinnova desanānusārena ñāṇaṃ pesetvā sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhito. Satthā uṭṭhāya
atk-s0301a:1474_10: vihāraṃ gato. Sopi cumbaṭaṃ āruyha kapālamādāya daṇḍamolubbha attano vasanaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0301a:1474_11: gacchanto vibbhantāya gāviyā jīvitā voropito mattikapātiṃ bhinditvā suvaṇṇapātiṃ
atk-s0301a:1474_12: paṭilabhanto viya dutiyacittavāre devaloke nibbatto attano puññaṃ nissāya aññe deve
atk-s0301a:1474_13: atikkamma virocittha. Taṃ kāraṇaṃ dassento sakko devānamindo eso kho mārisātiādimāha.
atk-s0301a:1475_0: Saddhāti maggenāgatasaddhā. Sīlañca yassa kalyāṇanti kalyāṇasīlaṃ nāma ariyasāvakassa
atk-s0301a:1475_1: ariyakantasīlaṃ vuccati. Tattha kiñcāpi ariyasāvakassa ekasīlampi akantaṃ nāma natthi,
atk-s0301a:1475_2: imasmiṃ panatthe bhavantarepi appahīnaṃ pañcasīlaṃ adhippetaṃ. Catutthaṃ.
atk-s0301a:1477_0: 261. Pañcame ārāmacetyāti ārāmacetiyāni. Vanacetyāti vanacetiyāni. Ubhayatthāpi cittīkataṭṭhena
atk-s0301a:1477_1: cetyaṃ veditabbaṃ. Manussarāmaṇeyyassāti manussaramaṇīyabhāvassa. Idāni manussaramaṇīyakavasena
atk-s0301a:1479_0: 262. Chaṭṭhe yajamānānanti yajantānaṃ. Tadā kira aṅgamagadhavāsikā manussā anusaṃvaccharaṃ
atk-s0301a:1479_1: sappimadhuphāṇitādīsu aggaṃ gahetvā ekasmiṃ ṭhāne dārūnaṃ saṭṭhimatte sakaṭabhāre
atk-s0301a:1479_2: rāsiṃ katvā aggiṃ datvā pajjalitakāle “mahābrahmuno yajāmā”ti taṃ sabbaṃ pakkhipanti.
atk-s0301a:1479_3: “Ekavāraṃ pakkhittaṃ sahassaguṇaphalaṃ detī”ti nesaṃ laddhi. Sakko devarājā “sabbepime
atk-s0301a:1479_4: sabbaaggāni gahetvā ‘mahābrahmuno yajāmā’ti aggimhi jhāpenti. Aphalaṃ karonti, mayi
atk-s0301a:1479_5: passante mā nassantu, yathā buddhassa ceva saṅghassa ca datvā bahuṃ puññaṃ pasavanti,
atk-s0301a:1479_6: evaṃ karissāmī”ti dārurāsiṃ jalāpetvā olokentesu manussesu puṇṇamadivase brahmattabhāvaṃ
atk-s0301a:1479_7: māpetvā mahājanassa passantasseva candamaṇḍalaṃ bhinditvā nikkhanto viya ahosi. Mahājano
atk-s0301a:1479_8: disvā “imaṃ yaññaṃ paṭiggahetuṃ mahābrahmā āgacchatī”ti jaṇṇukehi bhūmiyaṃ patiṭṭhāya,
atk-s0301a:1479_9: añjaliṃ paggayha namassamāno aṭṭhāsi. Brāhmaṇā āhaṃsu “tumhe ‘mayaṃ takkena kathemā’ti
atk-s0301a:1479_10: maññatha, idāni passatha, ayaṃ vo brahmā sahatthā yaññaṃ paṭiggahetuṃ āgacchatī”ti.
atk-s0301a:1479_11: Sakko āgantvā dārucitakamatthake ākāse ṭhatvā “kassāyaṃ sakkāro”ti pucchi? Tumhākaṃ,
atk-s0301a:1479_12: bhante, paṭiggaṇhatha no yaññanti. Tena hi āgacchatha, mā tulaṃ chaḍḍetvā hatthena
atk-s0301a:1479_13: tulayittha, ayaṃ satthā dhuravihāre vasati, taṃ pucchissāma “kassa dinnaṃ mahapphalaṃ
atk-s0301a:1479_14: hotī”ti? Ubhayaraṭṭhavāsino gahetvā satthu santikaṃ gantvā pucchanto evamāha.
atk-s0301a:1480_0: Tattha puññapekkhānanti puññaṃ icchantānaṃ puññatthikānaṃ. Opadhikaṃ puññanti upadhivipākaṃ
atk-s0301a:1480_1: puññaṃ. Saṅghe dinnaṃ mahapphalanti ariyasaṅghe dinnaṃ vipphāravantaṃ hoti. Desanāvasāne
atk-s0301a:1480_2: caturāsītipāṇasahassāni amatapānaṃ piviṃsu. Tato paṭṭhāya manussā sabbāni aggadānāni
atk-s0301a:1482_0: 263. Sattame uṭṭhehīti uṭṭhaha, ghaṭa, vāyama. Vijitasaṅgāmāti rāgādīnañceva dvādasayojanikassa
atk-s0301a:1482_1: ca mārabalassa jitattā bhagavantaṃ evaṃ ālapati. Pannabhārāti oropitakhandhakilesābhisaṅkhārabhāra.
atk-s0301a:1482_2: Pannarasāya rattinti pannarasāya puṇṇamāya rattiṃ. Sattamaṃ.
atk-s0301a:1484_0: 264. Aṭṭhame puthuddisāti catasso disā catasso anudisā ca. Bhummāti bhūmivāsino.
atk-s0301a:1484_1: Cirarattasamāhiteti upacārappanāhi cirarattasamāhitacitte. Vandeti vandāmi. Brahmacariyaparāyaṇeti
atk-s0301a:1484_2: dasapi vassāni vīsatipi vassāni…pe… saṭṭhipi vassāni āpāṇakoṭikaṃ ekaseyyaṃ ekabhattantiādikaṃ
atk-s0301a:1484_3: seṭṭhacariyaṃ brahmacariyaṃ caramāneti attho. Puññakarāti catupaccayadānaṃ kusumbhasumanapūjā
atk-s0301a:1484_4: dīpasahassajālanti evamādipuññakārakā. Sīlavantoti upāsakatte patiṭṭhāya pañcahipi
atk-s0301a:1484_5: dasahipi sīlehi samannāgatā. Dhammena dāraṃ posentīti umaṅgabhindanādīni akatvā dhammikehi
atk-s0301a:1484_6: kasigorakkhavaṇijjādīhi puttadāraṃ posenti. Pamukho rathamāruhīti devānaṃ pamukho
atk-s0301a:1486_0: 265. Navame bhagavantaṃ namassatīti ekaṃsaṃ uttariyaṃ dukulaṃ katvā, brahmajāṇuko
atk-s0301a:1486_1: hutvā sirasi añjaliṃ ṭhapetvā namassati. So yakkhoti so sakko. Anomanāmanti sabbaguṇehi
atk-s0301a:1486_2: omakabhāvassa natthitāya sabbaguṇanemittakehi nāmehi anomanāmaṃ. Avijjāsamatikkamāti
atk-s0301a:1486_3: catusaccapaṭicchādikāya vaṭṭamūlakaavijjāya samatikkamena. Sekkhāti satta sekkhā.
atk-s0301a:1486_4: Apacayārāmāti vaṭṭaviddhaṃsane ratā. Sikkhareti sikkhanti. Navamaṃ.
atk-s0301a:1488_0: 266. Dasame ajjhabhāsīti kasmā esa punappunaṃ evaṃ bhāsatīti? Sakkassa kira devarañño
atk-s0301a:1488_1: saddo madhuro, suphasitaṃ dantāvaraṇaṃ, kathanakāle suvaṇṇakiṅkiṇikasaddo viya niccharati.
atk-s0301a:1488_2: Taṃ punappunaṃ sotuṃ labhissāmīti bhāsati. Pūtidehasayāti pūtimhi mātusarīre vā,
atk-s0301a:1488_3: attanoyeva vā sarīraṃ avattharitvā sayanato pūtidehasayā. Nimuggā kuṇapamheteti dasamāse
atk-s0301a:1488_4: mātukucchisaṅkhāte kuṇapasmiṃ ete nimuggā. Etaṃ tesaṃ pihayāmīti etesaṃ etaṃ pihayāmi
atk-s0301a:1488_5: patthayāmi. Na te saṃ koṭṭhe opentīti na te saṃ santakaṃ dhaññaṃ koṭṭhe pakkhipanti.
atk-s0301a:1488_6: Na hi etesaṃ dhaññaṃ atthi. Na kumbhīti na kumbhiyaṃ. Na kaḷopiyanti na pacchiyaṃ.
atk-s0301a:1488_7: Paraniṭṭhitamesānāti paresaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ paraghare pakkaṃ bhikkhācāravattena esamānā
atk-s0301a:1488_8: gavesamānā. Tenāti evaṃ pariyiṭṭhena. Subbatāti dasapi…pe… saṭṭhipi vassāni susamādinnasundaravatā.
atk-s0301a:1489_0: Sumantamantinoti dhammaṃ sajjhāyissāma, dhutaṅgaṃ samādiyissāma, amataṃ paribhuñjissāma,
atk-s0301a:1489_1: samaṇadhammaṃ karissāmāti evaṃ subhāsitabhāsino. Tuṇhībhūtā samañcarāti tiyāmarattiṃ
atk-s0301a:1489_2: asanighosena ghositā viya dhammaṃ kathentāpi tuṇhībhūtā samaṃ carantiyeva nāma. Kasmā?
atk-s0301a:1489_3: Niratthakavacanassābhāvā. Puthumaccā cāti bahusattā ca aññamaññaṃ viruddhā. Attadaṇḍesu
atk-s0301a:1489_4: nibbutāti paraviheṭhanatthaṃ gahitadaṇḍesu sattesu nibbutā vissaṭṭhadaṇḍā. Sādānesu
atk-s0301a:1489_5: anādānāti sagahaṇesu sattesu ca bhavayoniādīnaṃ ekakoṭṭhāsassāpi agahitattā agahaṇā. Dasamaṃ.
atk-s0301a:1495_0: 268. Dutiye dubbaṇṇoti jhāmakhāṇuvaṇṇo. Okoṭimakoti lakuṇḍako mahodaro. Āsaneti paṇḍukambalasilāyaṃ.
atk-s0301a:1495_1: Kodhabhakkhoti sakkena gahitanāmamevetaṃ. So pana eko rūpāvacarabrahmā, “sakko kira
atk-s0301a:1495_2: khantibalena samannāgato”ti sutvā vīmaṃsanatthaṃ āgato. Avaruddhakayakkhā pana evarūpaṃ
atk-s0301a:1495_3: saṃvihitārakkhaṃ ṭhānaṃ pavisituṃ na sakkonti. Upasaṅkamīti devānaṃ sutvā “na sakkā
atk-s0301a:1495_4: esa pharusena cāletuṃ, nīcavuttinā pana khantiyaṃ ṭhitena sakkā palāpetu”nti tathā
atk-s0301a:1495_5: palāpetukāmo upasaṅkami. Antaradhāyīti khantiyaṃ ṭhatvā balavacittīkāraṃ paccupaṭṭhapetvā
atk-s0301a:1495_6: nīcavuttiyā dassiyamānāya sakkāsane ṭhātuṃ asakkonto antaradhāyi. Na sūpahatacittomhīti
atk-s0301a:1495_7: ettha sūti nipātamattaṃ, upahatacittomhīti āha. Nāvattena suvānayoti na kodhāvattena
atk-s0301a:1495_8: suānayo, kodhavase vattetuṃ na sukaromhīti vadati. Na vo cirāhanti voti nipātamattaṃ,
atk-s0301a:1495_9: ahaṃ ciraṃ na kujjhāmīti vadati. Dutiyaṃ.
atk-s0301a:1497_0: 269. Tatiye ābādhikoti isigaṇena abhisapakāle uppannābādhena ābādhiko. Vācehi manti
atk-s0301a:1497_1: sace maṃ sambarimāyaṃ vācesi, evamahaṃ tampi tikicchissāmīti vadati. Mā kho tvaṃ,
atk-s0301a:1497_2: mārisa, vācesīti vināpi tāva sambarimāyaṃ sakko amhe bādhati, yadi pana taṃ jānissati,
atk-s0301a:1497_3: naṭṭhā mayaṃ, mā attano ekassa atthāya amhe nāsehīti vatvā nivārayiṃsu. Sambarova
atk-s0301a:1497_4: sataṃ samanti yathā sambaro asurindo māyāvī māyaṃ payojetvā vassasataṃ niraye pakko,
atk-s0301a:1497_5: evaṃ paccati. Tumhe dhammikāva, alaṃ vo māyāyāti vadati. Kiṃ pana sakko tassa kodhaṃ
atk-s0301a:1497_6: tikicchituṃ sakkuṇeyyāti? Āma sakkuṇeyya. Kathaṃ? Tadā kira so isigaṇo dharatiyeva,
atk-s0301a:1497_7: tasmā naṃ isīnaṃ santikaṃ netvā khamāpeyya, evamassa phāsu bhaveyya. Tena pana vañcitattā
atk-s0301a:1499_0: 270. Catutthe sampayojesunti kalahaṃ akaṃsu. Accasarāti atikkami, eko bhikkhu ekaṃ
atk-s0301a:1499_1: bhikkhuṃ atikkamma vacanaṃ avocāti attho. Yathādhammaṃ nappaṭiggaṇhātīti na khamati.
atk-s0301a:1499_2: Kodho vo vasamāyātūti kodho tumhākaṃ vasaṃ āgacchatu, mā tumhe kodhavasaṃ gamitthāti
atk-s0301a:1499_3: dīpeti. Mā ca mitte hi vo jarāti ettha hīti nipātamattaṃ, tumhākaṃ mittadhamme jarā
atk-s0301a:1499_4: nāma mā nibbatti. Bhummatthe vā karaṇavacanaṃ, mittesu vo jarā mā nibbatti, mittabhāvato
atk-s0301a:1499_5: aññathābhāvo mā hotūti attho. Agarahiyaṃ mā garahitthāti agārayhaṃ khīṇāsavapuggalaṃ
atk-s0301a:1501_0: 271. Pañcame mā vo kodho ajjhabhavīti kodho tumhe mā abhibhavi, tumheva kodhaṃ abhibhavatha.
atk-s0301a:1501_1: Mā ca kujjhittha kujjhitanti kujjhantānaṃ mā paṭikujjhittha. Akkodhoti mettā ca mettāpubbabhāgo
atk-s0301a:1501_2: ca. Avihiṃsāti karuṇā ca karuṇāpubbabhāgo ca. Atha pāpajanaṃ kodho, pabbatovābhimaddatīti
atk-s0301a:1501_3: lāmakajanaṃ pabbato viya kodho abhimaddatīti. Pañcamaṃ.
